title: Lloyds Mobile Banking
description:
BE THE BOSS OF YOUR MONEY
Manage your money with confidence, whenever and wherever you need. Join our 10 million App users ‚Äì get the app and get started.

Seeing your balance, paying a bill or checking your transactions are just the start. Here‚Äôs some of the great stuff we‚Äôve got going on in the App. 

SPEND? SAVE? BORROW? INSURE? INVEST? APPLY IN THE APP TODAY
‚Ä¢	Not yet banking with us? Don‚Äôt worry ‚Äì download the App, it‚Äôs the quickest and easiest way to apply for a bank account with us.
‚Ä¢	You can share documents with us in real-time using your built-in camera to complete your application quickly.

TAKE CONTROL OF YOUR EVERYDAY SPENDING
‚Ä¢	Ever fallen into the subscription trap after that free trial? See, block and cancel subscriptions anytime.
‚Ä¢	Need to settle up or transfer money fast? With Faster Payments you can sort it in quick time.
‚Ä¢	Splitting the bill? Friend forgot their card? Request and receive money you‚Äôre owed from family and friends using ‚ÄòRequest a Payment‚Äô.
‚Ä¢	Get support all day and night, every day. 

STAY IN THE KNOW WITH REAL TIME INSIGHTS
‚Ä¢	Know what‚Äôs going on with your money in real-time, with upcoming payments and instant notifications when money‚Äôs coming in and going out.
‚Ä¢	Wondering where your money goes? See where you‚Äôre spending and where you might be able to save, with Spending Insights.

MAKE YOUR MONEY WORK HARDER FOR YOU
‚Ä¢	Enjoy a cheeky bargain or three with Everyday Offers. Earn cashback of up to 15% from a range of retailers with our current accounts and credit cards.
‚Ä¢	Turn your pennies to pounds ‚Äì using ‚ÄòSave the Change‚Äô. We‚Äôll round up your debit card spend to the nearest pound and move it into a chosen savings account with us. 
‚Ä¢	Keep track of your credit score for free, with helpful tips and tools to improve it

KEEPING YOU AND YOUR MONEY SAFE
‚Ä¢	Use your fingerprint to login - it‚Äôs the fastest and most secure way to bank.
‚Ä¢	Whether your card is lost, stolen or turned into a chew toy, you can relax knowing you can freeze it, unfreeze it or order a new one in seconds.
‚Ä¢	With the latest security tech we keep your money safe and stop those pesky hackers in their tracks.
‚Ä¢	Your eligible deposits with Lloyds are protected up to ¬£85,000 by the Financial Services Compensation Scheme. Find out more at lloydsbank.com/FSCS

LEAVE US A REVIEW ABOUT OUR APP
We‚Äôre always ready to listen and make things better for you.
 
Lloyds and Lloyds Bank are trading names of Lloyds Bank Plc (registered in England and Wales (no. 2065), registered office: 25 Gresham Street, London EC2V 7HN). Authorised by the Prudential Regulation Authority and regulated by the Financial Conduct Authority and the Prudential Regulation Authority under registration number 119278.
The app is available to customers with a UK personal bank account and valid registered phone number.
  
LEGAL INFORMATION
This app is designed and intended for Lloyds UK customers to access and service UK personal products, and for customers of Lloyds Bank Corporate Markets plc, using the business names Lloyds Bank International and Lloyds Bank International Private Banking, to access and service personal products held in Jersey, Guernsey and the Isle of Man. It should only be downloaded for this purpose.

While the app can be downloaded from App Stores outside the UK, this does not mean we are inviting, offering or recommending you engage in any transactions or establish a customer relationship with Lloyds or Lloyds Bank Corporate Markets plc.
Any confirmation that our product or service complies with European Union law is made to Apple to meet this legal requirement. This does not imply any representation, warranty, or statement to you and should not be relied upon for entering into any contract.
descriptionHTML:
BE THE BOSS OF YOUR MONEY
Manage your money with confidence, whenever and wherever you need. Join our 10 million App users ‚Äì get the app and get started.

Seeing your balance, paying a bill or checking your transactions are just the start. Here‚Äôs some of the great stuff we‚Äôve got going on in the App.

SPEND? SAVE? BORROW? INSURE? INVEST? APPLY IN THE APP TODAY
‚Ä¢ Not yet banking with us? Don‚Äôt worry ‚Äì download the App, it‚Äôs the quickest and easiest way to apply for a bank account with us.
‚Ä¢ You can share documents with us in real-time using your built-in camera to complete your application quickly.

TAKE CONTROL OF YOUR EVERYDAY SPENDING
‚Ä¢ Ever fallen into the subscription trap after that free trial? See, block and cancel subscriptions anytime.
‚Ä¢ Need to settle up or transfer money fast? With Faster Payments you can sort it in quick time.
‚Ä¢ Splitting the bill? Friend forgot their card? Request and receive money you‚Äôre owed from family and friends using ‚ÄòRequest a Payment‚Äô.
‚Ä¢ Get support all day and night, every day.

STAY IN THE KNOW WITH REAL TIME INSIGHTS
‚Ä¢ Know what‚Äôs going on with your money in real-time, with upcoming payments and instant notifications when money‚Äôs coming in and going out.
‚Ä¢ Wondering where your money goes? See where you‚Äôre spending and where you might be able to save, with Spending Insights.

MAKE YOUR MONEY WORK HARDER FOR YOU
‚Ä¢ Enjoy a cheeky bargain or three with Everyday Offers. Earn cashback of up to 15% from a range of retailers with our current accounts and credit cards.
‚Ä¢ Turn your pennies to pounds ‚Äì using ‚ÄòSave the Change‚Äô. We‚Äôll round up your debit card spend to the nearest pound and move it into a chosen savings account with us.
‚Ä¢ Keep track of your credit score for free, with helpful tips and tools to improve it

KEEPING YOU AND YOUR MONEY SAFE
‚Ä¢ Use your fingerprint to login - it‚Äôs the fastest and most secure way to bank.
‚Ä¢ Whether your card is lost, stolen or turned into a chew toy, you can relax knowing you can freeze it, unfreeze it or order a new one in seconds.
‚Ä¢ With the latest security tech we keep your money safe and stop those pesky hackers in their tracks.
‚Ä¢ Your eligible deposits with Lloyds are protected up to ¬£85,000 by the Financial Services Compensation Scheme. Find out more at lloydsbank.com/FSCS

LEAVE US A REVIEW ABOUT OUR APP
We‚Äôre always ready to listen and make things better for you.

Lloyds and Lloyds Bank are trading names of Lloyds Bank Plc (registered in England and Wales (no. 2065), registered office: 25 Gresham Street, London EC2V 7HN). Authorised by the Prudential Regulation Authority and regulated by the Financial Conduct Authority and the Prudential Regulation Authority under registration number 119278.
The app is available to customers with a UK personal bank account and valid registered phone number.

LEGAL INFORMATION
This app is designed and intended for Lloyds UK customers to access and service UK personal products, and for customers of Lloyds Bank Corporate Markets plc, using the business names Lloyds Bank International and Lloyds Bank International Private Banking, to access and service personal products held in Jersey, Guernsey and the Isle of Man. It should only be downloaded for this purpose.

While the app can be downloaded from App Stores outside the UK, this does not mean we are inviting, offering or recommending you engage in any transactions or establish a customer relationship with Lloyds or Lloyds Bank Corporate Markets plc.
Any confirmation that our product or service complies with European Union law is made to Apple to meet this legal requirement. This does not imply any representation, warranty, or statement to you and should not be relied upon for entering into any contract.
summary: Your bank in your pocket

scraped_reviews.content: Works well but sometimes says there are problems at the Lloyds end and asks to restart it. Restarts then usually fail. Outages are warned in advance and are not the cause of thid problem. It now also notifies you of payments made on phone, but the notifications are rather slow to arrive. Payments can be set to pay later, which is helpful. Regular payees appear at top of the list, too.

Would give 4.7 stars if it were possible. Easy to use and navigate. There has been a useful increase in features during the last 2 years, and the visual presentation is now much clearer. The search facility now has an editable search-scope end date. Requests: Lloyds, please label payments in and out with the last 4 digits of the distant account number, for identification. And please stop using silly terms like "Your spaces". They're not spaces, they're sections ‚Äî the app is not a spacecraft!

Since the redesign of the app, it is not easy to get statements downloaded for savings account. Clicking on the 3 dots does not give you the option. When you search in the help section, it tells you to locate them in your digital inbox, which again is hard to find. I ended up putting 'inbox' in search field and found it that way. It's very convoluted, it was better before.

Still too many warnings and interruptions. Why do I always get asked these things when on mobile data?Font choice is awful, colour scheme awful. Not good for those with reading issues. Things keep getting moved in the name of 'progress' when the app has been great for ages .Far too many interuptions on start up. So many times you just want to log in and you have to go through either a details update our some news they want you to know about. Just let me log in.Far too much downtime for a bank.

The app and safety is excellent! The only thing I want is that to introduce with the next updates the option to hide from the main page the money left in account and transactions and leave a clean face page only name and bank name. This is for a private matter when someone around. Please take that in consideration for next update.

Edit: had this app for over 2 years, recent updates are worst ever. Font is appalling, difficult to read/focus: downloads are either too slow or time out with error message: connection is unstable, seems to have an issue with WiFi sometimes. Overall Lloyds have taken a pretty perfect service on the app and basically broken it with the updated changes.

Constantly getting "APP launch failed", never had an issue until a recent update. Going back a couple of years it was superb, in fact I gave feedback suggesting not to change a thing! But with the last few updates it's just got worse, even the font makes it 'look' insecure/unprofessional...

The redesiged UI is a huge step in the wrong direction. The new app as a whole feels like if a mobile game designer tried to design a banking app, the amount of annoying buttons and links trying to upsell me packages I have no interest in when I'm just trying to view my accounts is infuriating. The app is still functioning, but it is slower, more confusing and clearly had more of a focus on sales than providing a reliable and easy to use service. If I could use the old app I would.

Easy to use, great flexibility. Particularly like feature of 'customable' upcoming payments. App has been updated making it easier to use. The one downside I have found is with the upcoming payments that it adds in the previous credit card bill rather than the actual bill, so you need to be careful. Cannot understand why it does not use the actual bill figures.

Used to be very good but recent updates are a step back. you used to be able to see the detail of upcoming payments and then edit or amend. Now if its a one off future payment it won't show the detail it jumps to all the scheduled payments so you cant amend it. Several features are no longer really intuitive and frequently don't work as you would expect. Messaging to describe a problem sends you round in circles with your bot. waste of time. Can't find app feedback anywhere.

I like the app except for when it constantly asks for a verification code. I want to use it on my laptop not my phone but then I have to find my phone to get the code. Its all the time. The notifications about me using my overdraft going constantly to my text is annoying as I know. It has good points too. It's very easy to make payments. My biggest whine is the overdraft charges which are ¬£30 plus a month for me.

recently had an issue with it. I created a standing order with NS&I that did not appear under standing order, subscriptions and direct debit lists. I cannot cancel it although it was made in error. The app has no recourse to deal with this issue and the money keeps leaving the account. The issue stems from registering the payment as a bill instead of a payee. but issue has not been sorted. This bug is still there several months later

This app is very poorly written at least for trying to register. Names etc. are not trimmed on entry so the database does not match the details correctly. No feedback is given as to what the problem is. There are no details given for the memorable information so it is trial and error when trying to create some. Finally each time the code to continue was sent the app lost Internet connection and the whole process had to be restarted!

I have been banking with Lloyd's for over 10+ years and will continue to do so as I think their app is the best out there. I never had to go the branch and was always able to resolve my queries using their 24/7 message and call support. I know Lloyds are already adding more banks to see account details with other banks and my only suggestion is to also include Clear Bank in the list. I will give it a 5 start then.

Just starting to try to use it. The instructions for getting started are a pain. Especially If you are in a household where there are a lot of interuptions. You keep getting logged out while you try to get to to grips with setting up the username or the password. Also as an older person it took me a while to discover how to set up the my date of birth, initially I was clicking madly on the back key! Getting there but needs better instructions on how to break down the accounts and former banks.

Got locked out of my own account. When trying to reset my log in details, the only option to call was a number I've never even seen before, instead of my own. Managed to still contact customer support that recognised my voice login, but I'm essentially locked out of my account forever and only able to access bank statements via customer support with no way to change the number back to my own

awful app, had it 5 days and has worked once. called 3 times only to be told to do what I've done several times already. reset phone, reset password, still can't login properly. closing my account with them, utterly useless. I would give it no stars but you have to give it at least one to be able to post a review! joke. ZERO STARS

Dreadful! Not the most userfriendly. You have to remember too many passcodes, memorable words etc, if it doesn't recognise your fingerprint on the app (none of my otherbm apss have this fingerprint problem) makes logging in over complicated, and you have to call the help line, which closes at 5pm if you forget ! The internet version is also just aa complicated. Compared to other bank apps, that I use where you only have to set up a one time password, fingerprint AND face recognition.

For two days now, I cannot make payments on this app to an international bank account. I cannot also add bank accounts of new recipients. Anytime I opt to pay money into my own foreign bank account, or add a new recipient for both international and UK, the screen says"wait" and stays blank for hours. In reported this to the International desk and someone told me that the app was experiencing this problem and that it would take a long time to fix. And no one gave any prior notice about this.

Recently started happening that when i have to pay someone new, i enter there account name, sort code and account number and then it does the check that it account is matching with bank account, but that does not go away, in the background it show to enter money amount and reference but the checking sign does not go away, so annoying, having to try 3-4 times and enter account details each time to hope that it works.

Have always found app quick and easy to use but trying to send a sum overseas has been impossible . Two options - "pay someone new" & select "international account" or select "send money overseas" result in a white screen. Help starts with a bot which didn't "get" the problem , when passed to online asdistance, advised to clear the cache & also also telld me to do as outlined above even though told I'd done that. No success , will have to go to telephone which was the final suggestion

Dear Developers, Your app doesn‚Äôt work when my device has multiple fingerprints added, even though all of them are mine (4 different fingers). I understand it doesn‚Äôt support fingerprints from different people, but in this case, they‚Äôre all mine. I saved my fingerprint in the app during the first login, and it worked then, but it‚Äôs not accepting it when I try to log in again. I even reinstalled the app, but it still doesn‚Äôt work. Is there any way to fix this, or do I need to delete the other fin

So much easier now. I remember having to go through several layers of choices etc to maybe, just maybe getting the information you needed. Now they've obviously listened and learnt a lot and it's streamlined, clear and concise. Good job guys üòÅ. That said I haven't had to use it for help or customer service yet. If I do, I'll update you üòéüëã

After weeks of hassel trying to update old, then not able to install new, i kept getting told get new one soon, finally got it. looks the same, but for a few boxes, stuff that was already in a menu. most annoying are the boxes that keep asking you if you are looking for xyz. Come on, app writers, we are adults!!! I am of a pre pc generation and have managed my banking very well without all that.

On the whole the app is good and sufficient for my needs but there are times when I put in the requested digits correctly and am told they are wrong and to try again. This can happen several times before I gain access to my on- line account. Of course this could be a level of security which if it is I fully understand. Other than that the app is fine and no issues... Thankyou.

Is there no QA team at Lloyd's?! The account registration has no guidance on what the rules for 'memorable information' should be, so the next 're-enter' field does not unlock until the magic combination is entered. Randomly figured out it's not length but needs a text and number combination. Then on the next step of getting a call to enter the 4 digit code, entered all fine but the app in some permanently disconnected state complaining of no Internet connection. When the connection is all fine!

I only looked this morning at the credit card measure saying, pay a minimum of ¬£5 or incur a ¬£12 fine. I feel this is a bit of a cheek. I went paperless, because you wanted me too, but it's not helped me. I have just paid off in full. I would prefer more warning and maybe 3 messages as the deadline e closes in.

App does exactly what I need it to do. Makes life much easier. Been using it for several years now and it keeps improving. Now I can deposit cheques online - no need to visit a branch or post cheques - my account is credited straightaway. I don't know how they can improve this app, they just seem to know what I need and the app does it. I'm a very satisfied customer. August 24 - app still great. So easy to do everything that I need. I couldn't be happier with it.

The fact that I don't have the worries of travelling to do any transaction with fewer banks around, then coping with the long queues. Now a days is a breeze in your pjs. I'm so happy to have online banking. Covid 19 was the way forward for me. Now, no going back. I'm now used to checking my balance without making a call. I give online banking, AüåüStarüåü ü§©üëçüèºüëçüèΩ üíÉ

Very poor experience. They have opened a basic account without even asking if I wanted it, when I applied for the Lloyds club. Of course, they also started a switch service. Without me agreeing to it. And custumer service cannot do anything. I was told I need to go to the branch, then get to my old bank to stop the switch etc. It's just a very, very poor quality bank.

Really good and stable app. Only 4 stars as the payments section is a bit poor. It only lists your existing payees by name. When you have multiple accounts for one person it is really annoying trying to find the specific account. Showing the reference on that screen would be helpful

I will rate the app a solid 4 just because you have to call customer service to remove devices from your account. this is a basic thing a customer should do themselves. majority of the banks allow customers to do this themselves. every other thing on the app is good. please rectify the issue, a big bank like Lloyds shouldn't have this limitation.

The experience I have on the app has always been a very positive one, from checking my balance doing instant transfers as well as paying my credit card to much more such as opening savings ect...I can only say try it as I highly recommend it if you have a Lloyds account and you like doing super quick banking..A+++

Had to uninstall it because the memorable info that happily lets me into the account on my pc refuses point blank to do so on my mobile. Then, although I have LPA access to manage my mum's account, it wouldn't let me set that up. Spend a very frustrating hour just trying to pay in a cheque refund from the sale of her car. It would have been quicker to walk into town, even with a broken toe! Not happy.

The API that links to the credit agency does not refresh or update. Mine has been stuck since September 2025. My score shows correctly in other apps, just not Lloyd's, but apparently, it's not their problem. Or so their woeful support tell me.

knowing how much will be left until next payday is a very useful feature on the desktop website, however, its not configured correctly on the app. If i want to see that, I have to manually select the next payday everytime. In the desktop version, you can set your payday date once and this is saved. Its an annoying incovenience. The app has gone through many redesigns but this feature has not been included.

Hi. Since 27th of October there's a new, full screen intrusive and obstructive ad which stays on, impossible to get around it. Please fix! UPDATE: No response from developers, and just wrote my third email, previous ones are ignored. Samsung Galaxy S23 Ultra with latest, updated software. Please fix and don't ignore, because the app became unusable!

The Lloyds Bank app is so easy and accessible to use and although I was nervous about setting the Lloyds Bank app now I know I didn't make mistake and it's so easy to use. This app also saves me a lot of paperwork in keeping a record of my finances and transactions. Thanks to Lloyds Bank for helping me access this app and for always being there when I needed support and help and advice with my finances. I find the Lloyds Bank app easy to use and very good for keeping a close watch on finance.

Lloyds credit cards don't support Samsung Pay, so I can't use my Fold 7 with it, unless I sign up for a 3rd party service. Chatbot is useless and wastes a chunk of your time. Trade shares? Good luck trying to pay more than ¬£1000 without it being blocked, workaround? Use another bank account. Time to close my account..

Hi, the application is working perfectly ‚Äî the layout looks amazing and it‚Äôs very easy to navigate. However, I think there‚Äôs an issue with notifications. Mine are switched on, but I‚Äôm still not receiving any. I‚Äôve tested this on both my Samsung S25 Ultra and S10 Plus, and the problem occurs on both devices. Could you please look into this? Thank you!

scraped_reviews.userName: and others and others and others
scraped_reviews.content: Lloyds often doesn't let you spend your own money and you'll have to phone them up to ask for their permission to use your money, and even then they might not allow it. They once left me stranded 4 hours away from home, in London, unable to purchase a train ticket on the underground. I had to use another bank despite having funds available. Would have been stuck if I didn't have a backup bank. When I phoned Lloyds they couldn't help and didn't care.

This app is amazing but... Recently I've had issues where it doesn't let me view my payments and it's quite difficult to find the standing order, direct debit, credit score and subscription sections in the app. That's why I gave it 4 instead of 5 stars. Would still recommend Lloyds to everyone as they have been the best bank that I've ever had. they've already had the issues so they know how to fix them so it's easier for them to help you. That's why I moved to Lloyds in the first place.

Works well, thanks for a useful and stable app. It's now 7 years since my review, the app and features have continued to improve, but so has the up-selling opportunity, whilst the bank continues to cut branches and keeps interest rates lower than building societies. I've moved all savings away from Lloyds due to poor interest rates and poor customer service in branch. I prefer physical branches despite the poor service as the staff are being programmed by imbeciles in head office with an agenda.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thanks for the feedback Stuart, we're hoping to release a new version of the app over the next few weeks. Keep an eye out for the update. Apologies for the inconvenience. Anthony.

scraped_reviews.content: doesn't work. it's flakey at best with the messaging service they offe, terrible. it's not manned 24 x 7 and incredibly difficult to find it get a reply from. it's simply not good enough when compared to other banks Appa.

it's a good app but, can be a bit confusing for people who aren't very good with technology. It's very good it has a paying in cheque facility. However it is flawed and doesn't always work and then because you've scanned the cheque once, it won't let you do it again which means having to take the cheque to the bank, which isn't very good for immobile people like myself. So it's good but needs more improvement and to make sure the online facilities work 100% of the time.

Until July 25, I had used the app for many years on a Samsung s9 without issue. In July, I transferred to a Sausung s24. The deposit of a cheque option now states that this is a new option and gives details on how to take a photo of the cheque. The app doesn't allow you to exit the information screens. You have to close the app and restart, but on relauching the app, you again can not get past the information screen and actually pay the cheque in. Please sort.

Half the interface of this app has been replaced with a useless AI bot. can't change credit card payment dates or direct debit options without speaking to a bit that doesn't actually seem to change anything. What should take a few minutes in a traditional user interface takes days of failing and waiting to get connected to a human agent.

Great app been using on my mobile devices for over 4 years now. only had one problem when my android phone stopped getting updates (was old smart phone) Purchased new phone no problems since. Find app very useful. Can prevent oversea payments and reinstate if going abroad for example. Say if you accidently misplaced your card can put remp block on your card and reinstate when you find your card.

First time using the app and I was plagued with errors and faults. setting up Internet banking, the app lost connection when I received the verification call. This meant I was unable to continue After eventually getting access, a major service on the card is supposedly "unavailable" Really bad UI and unclear signing.

Works well quickly and accurately. Pleasure to use. Can be a bit too safe. After sending a payment and wanting to share the details, the request for feedback closed the app and it is then not possible to re enter a transaction to share the details. Just sorry we have to use this rather than the local staff in our Ryde IoW branch that is closing.

title: Pixtica: Camera and Editor
description: Pixtica is a feature-rich ¬´All-in-One¬ª camera app with great photo and video editors, a comprehensive gallery, and plenty of creative tools. Built for photography enthusiasts, filmmakers and creative minds. Designed to be fast and intuitive so you never miss a moment again. Pixtica's intuitive design helps you unleash your creative potential, so you can take the perfect photos and videos, no matter your level of experience in photography. MAJOR FEATURES ‚Ä¢ Filters, stickers and textures ‚Äì A large selection of assets to compose unique creations. From professional filters, to fish-eye lenses, and even animated stickers. ‚Ä¢ Manual Controls ‚Äì If your device has manual controls capabilities, then you can now unleash the full power of your camera at a pro-grade level like a DSLR, and intuitively adjust the ISO, shutter speed, focus, exposure, and white balance. Attention: Manual controls require that your device manufacturer allows apps to use them, and not only to the factory camera app. ‚Ä¢ Portrait mode ‚Äì Take photos with a blurred background, or use the portrait editor to apply blur areas to any photo, and even make bokeh effects. You can also replace the photo's background, or even remove it with a stage-light effect. ‚Ä¢ Panorama ‚Äì Capture breathtaking wide panoramas with a very easy-to-use interface. (Requires gyroscope on device). ‚Ä¢ HDR ‚Äì Take beautiful HDR photos with multiple presets. ‚Ä¢ GIF Recorder ‚Äì Create GIF animations with different capture modes for unique loops. Your selfies will never be the same again. ‚Ä¢ Time-Lapse and Hyperlapse ‚Äì Record accelerated events using time lapse motion. ‚Ä¢ Slow Motion ‚Äì Record videos in epic slow motion. (When the device supports it). ‚Ä¢ Tiny Planet ‚Äì Create little planets in real-time with live preview thanks to Pixtica's advanced stereographic projection algorithm. ‚Ä¢ Photobooth ‚Äì Have fun with automatic photo collages ready to share. With the option to pause between each photo taken, so you can produce very creative compositions. Give it a try with a selfie collage. ‚Ä¢ Document Scanner ‚Äì Scan any type of document to JPEG or even PDF. ‚Ä¢ MEME editor ‚Äì Oh yes, with Pixtica you can also create Memes, with a large selection of high quality stickers. ‚Ä¢ RAW ‚Äì Shoot photos in RAW format like a pro. (When the device supports it). ‚Ä¢ Smart guide-lines ‚Äì Flat-lay photography has never been so easy thanks to the flat position indicator. ‚Ä¢ Gallery ‚Äì Access all your media with a complete gallery which includes tools to make collages, convert photos into GIF slideshows, create Memes, and even PDF documents. ‚Ä¢ Photo Editor ‚Äì Give a creative touch to your photos with filters, a large selection of stickers, and even a drawing tool for easy sketching. ‚Ä¢ Video Editor ‚Äì Retouch your videos with animated stickers, duration trimming, and other adjustments. ‚Ä¢ Magic Hours ‚Äì Find out the best daytime periods for the blue and golden hours. ‚Ä¢ QR Scanner ‚Äì Included QR / Barcode scanner, so you have everything you need in a single app.
descriptionHTML:
Pixtica is a feature-rich ¬´All-in-One¬ª camera app with great photo and video editors, a comprehensive gallery, and plenty of creative tools. Built for photography enthusiasts, filmmakers and creative minds. Designed to be fast and intuitive so you never miss a moment again.

Pixtica's intuitive design helps you unleash your creative potential, so you can take the perfect photos and videos, no matter your level of experience in photography.

MAJOR FEATURES

‚Ä¢ Filters, stickers and textures ‚Äì A large selection of assets to compose unique creations. From professional filters, to fish-eye lenses, and even animated stickers.

‚Ä¢ Manual Controls ‚Äì If your device has manual controls capabilities, then you can now unleash the full power of your camera at a pro-grade level like a DSLR, and intuitively adjust the ISO, shutter speed, focus, exposure, and white balance. Attention: Manual controls require that your device manufacturer allows apps to use them, and not only to the factory camera app.

‚Ä¢ Portrait mode ‚Äì Take photos with a blurred background, or use the portrait editor to apply blur areas to any photo, and even make bokeh effects. You can also replace the photo's background, or even remove it with a stage-light effect.

‚Ä¢ Panorama ‚Äì Capture breathtaking wide panoramas with a very easy-to-use interface. (Requires gyroscope on device).

‚Ä¢ HDR ‚Äì Take beautiful HDR photos with multiple presets.

‚Ä¢ GIF Recorder ‚Äì Create GIF animations with different capture modes for unique loops. Your selfies will never be the same again.

‚Ä¢ Time-Lapse and Hyperlapse ‚Äì Record accelerated events using time lapse motion.

‚Ä¢ Slow Motion ‚Äì Record videos in epic slow motion. (When the device supports it).

‚Ä¢ Tiny Planet ‚Äì Create little planets in real-time with live preview thanks to Pixtica's advanced stereographic projection algorithm.

‚Ä¢ Photobooth ‚Äì Have fun with automatic photo collages ready to share. With the option to pause between each photo taken, so you can produce very creative compositions. Give it a try with a selfie collage.

‚Ä¢ Document Scanner ‚Äì Scan any type of document to JPEG or even PDF.

‚Ä¢ MEME editor ‚Äì Oh yes, with Pixtica you can also create Memes, with a large selection of high quality stickers.

‚Ä¢ RAW ‚Äì Shoot photos in RAW format like a pro. (When the device supports it).

‚Ä¢ Smart guide-lines ‚Äì Flat-lay photography has never been so easy thanks to the flat position indicator.

‚Ä¢ Gallery ‚Äì Access all your media with a complete gallery which includes tools to make collages, convert photos into GIF slideshows, create Memes, and even PDF documents.

‚Ä¢ Photo Editor ‚Äì Give a creative touch to your photos with filters, a large selection of stickers, and even a drawing tool for easy sketching.

‚Ä¢ Video Editor ‚Äì Retouch your videos with animated stickers, duration trimming, and other adjustments.

‚Ä¢ Magic Hours ‚Äì Find out the best daytime periods for the blue and golden hours.

‚Ä¢ QR Scanner ‚Äì Included QR / Barcode scanner, so you have everything you need in a single app.
summary: Professional camera with photo and video editors, plus a comprehensive gallery.

scraped_reviews.content: My pre-set cameras never seem to take even the most simple and decent photos. But since I've discovered this app. I've been very impressed with the results I get. It gives me plenty of options and even great at letting me add or take away the background. My pictures come out much more clearer and professional than any other app. I've used. The only thing I would like is for it to get good results in darker environments. Then I'd give this a 5‚≠ê's. Still I like this app. very much!

I've been using this app for a really long time now. Even before I purchased it. The only thing I wished you would offered were more filters. I like this because it is simple too use. And you have more creative filters that really stand out! A 'grainy' filter would be an improvement, as I like more transitioning on my captures. Otherwise Great Job!!

Love the interface and the features! I purchased the app for that alone with hopes that it will improve. The camera quality is significantly worse than stock camera, though. I have taken several photos of the exact same objects (same time, same position) and Pixtica is not even close to stock camera app. This is a bit disappointing, but hope it improves over time. Using OnePlus 6t.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Andres. Thanks for the review. Could you please send us some photo samples to understand the differences you are seeing? The quality should be at least ass good as the stock one, never worse. We can only guess that if different then probably your device stock camera may be using some private processing not exposed to third-party cameras. Thanks

scraped_reviews.content: I use this app on a Galaxy Note 20 and Xperia Pro-I and it is exceptional. The only suggestions I have would be to allow Raw only shooting and perhaps a shortcut to a standard Level (perhaps one similar to Olympus or one with an interchangeable style between the more common center level and the alternative). I have looked at quite a few apps looking for a Hallide for Android, and this is one of my favorites by far, nice and simple but very capable.

Everything is generally fine, the picture quality is good. The camera version is quite stable. However, whenever I switch to the ultra-wide sensor, it turns black and white, and even after taking the picture, it remains black and white or gets saved that way. This is probably happening because it‚Äôs not fully compatible with the device. Perhaps the camera app isn‚Äôt completely compatible with the phone. Please resolve this issue as quickly as possible.

Choosing only between 80, 90, and 100 (100? Seriously?) for JPEG isn't nearly enough granularity when every couple of steps represents such a substantial difference in the quality/storage trade-off. otherwise, this app is largely easy to use and responds much more quickly than my (borked) stock camera. (now if only Android would play nice and stick to the same store ID so it could recognise purchases properly - not this app's problem though)

A very good app!! but pls make it possible to be able to save videos/pics on sd card. Also noticed that to record a video, in low light, I always have to increase iso or will have to turn the camera light on for better results. But daylight not much but okay But this app is unmatched!! No app I have used comes this close for camera! Pixtica teamüî•üî•üî•
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi. If your device produces dark videos, then in the configuration settings under the "video" section you will find the setting "correct dark video recording". About the SD card, Pixtica already supports it, but it is needed at least Android 10 or above, as previous versions of Android were too fragmented to implement such a feature. Regards.

scraped_reviews.content: After using this app on several phones I decided to buy it. This is the most complete camera app with a lot of extras not found on a lot of other apps. If you scroll the modes bar all the way to the left, it will display a lot of modes. Great job, keep it that way with small improvements without breaking it üòÉüëç I paid $5 for the perpetual license, a single price I like it and did a post on FB to let know this is one of the best camera apps.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello. Thank you very much for your feedback. We will investigate the problem you have reported. About the subscription model, keep in mind that it costs less than a cup of coffee in a Starbucks, but with the difference that you can use our application for a full year, and the cup of coffee generally lasts less than 20 minutes. Regards.

scraped_reviews.content: Limited capabilities with galaxy xcover pro. Times where it failed to save, slow motion is choppy like it can't access full frame rate of the camera, can't access the wide angle camera. Pixtica claims if it can't use it then it's likely Samsung's fault for locking the feature. I paid $10 hoping to get a better camera app than the stock but I find myself using the stock much more often. The pro camera has a bit more control than the stock, and there are more filter options to play with etc.

My favorite cam out of 2yrs of fine tuning and searching. Adorable? Yeah ummm they should charge more to be honest. You guys are worth wayyyy more. I'll pay it and the difference. Only thing is like to see is a wider range for shutter speed. That's all. Best fillers out on the market on top of the unique ones only they have! Get to the picture! I'm right here what are you waiting for!?

Excellent app. One issue, video doesn't seem to record accurately what I see on screen on my Redmi Note 8 phone . I set the camera up to record myself outdoors. When I tapped on record button, it recorded from a different angle and cut my head out of the picture. Is this usual behaviour for the video function? Update: Thanks for your swift and detailed response! Looks like the issue is with my phone rather than your excellent app. 5 stars.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi. When recording, what the viewfinder displays and what is being recorded is left up to the actual hardware image sensor, so it's effectively not under the control of the app. If the stock camera app doesn't show that issue, it's likely that the device manufacturer is using private correction APIs, which aren't available to third-party apps.

scraped_reviews.content: I understand the science behind it ,, and kind of knew what type of response I just had ran out of characters to type. I just simply meant that from my experience with other apps that are my main top camera apps I resort too and this one being one of them now that I kind of rediscover it after not using for a while , all have the same manual controls when you switch to video . Whether it actually is shutter or not I don't know but it says it is and most importantly it keeps same quality n expo
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Jason. Thanks for your feedback. For videos there is no manual shutter speed because the paradigm is different from photos. Videos are recorded at a constant fps (frames per second), and the shutter speed keeps a lens open for a specific duration to capture a single frame, therefore shutter speed can't be used in video as it would brake the fps.

scraped_reviews.content: (October update) I'm impressed! It has a nice design üëå is light, fast and simple, but with advanced featuresüí™ (like RAW, etc) easily accessible ! They merged the best of both worlds. The subscription price seems reasonable and fair to me. Please add a option for "focus peaking", choose bitrate in video Settings. Increase the quality of panoramic photographs a little moreüîù (sometimes you lose details in landscape photos for example) and hide the navigation bar. That's allüôè Great job guys! ‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello. Thanks for your feedback. As of version 2019.24, we have added a new indicator to make Flatlay photography much simpler. It will appear automatically when it is detected that the device is a near flat position. In addition, we made also that all the guidelines get highlighted when the device is pointing down, up or forward. Regards.

scraped_reviews.content: I love the user friendly layout of the app. It has some nice tools built in to it. I have noticed though that the file size of the photos taken with this app don't seem to be as high resolution compared to other apps. I have it set on the highest setting I'm allowed for my device but it still can't compare. If this can be fixed this app would be amazing.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello. The quality of photos is always the maximum supported by the device. When it comes to the actual file size, this is related mostly into how well the image is being encoded and saved to disk. Therefore, if you have different apps using the same resolution but saving larger files, then it means that those other apps are doing a very poor job.

scraped_reviews.content: Really good photo app with a whole lot of filters and fun effects. So many photo apps I have tried have one issue or another but this one seems to cover everything. Open Camera was good but too slow to take a picture, another had no panorama mode, and others still that have panorama have no HDR mode. The only thing missing for me is the ability to change the the save location for your photos. This is important since it allows all my photos to show up in one place without being subdivided by which program took the picture. Please add this feature to later updates! Oh and is $7 for a really good app that much to ask? C'mon people. (Would love if it was a part of the "Family" compatible apps :) )

I like the app bar the one thing I wanted it for. On the new Samsung S24 taking wb off auto washes all the colour out. Basically you can't change it off auto. Possibly the app isn't configured for newer HDR capabilities of the ph and you haven't adapted the app to this? The only camera app I've found that works properly with wb adjustment is Samsung's own, that is preinstalled on the ph. Very disappointing as I want an app to take accurate pics of artwork as is and need wb control.

Great camera app. Good controls, no overprocessing like gcam (I'm on a pixel 7 n can't stand gcams overprocessing & forced colour scheme). pixtica has a beautiful shutter sound too. similar to the mi 12s ultra's. an under-rated feature, the shutter sound makes snapping very satisfying. I would love if portrait mode would work on any subject rather than just faces. some more usable film simulation filters would be great too. it's a brilliant app tho. my favourite 3rd party camera. Great work

Everything in one app, lots of useful camera modes and tools. Love the separate gallery to camera, the gallery makes browsing, managing and sharing photos easy. Definitely needs ability to copy/move pics between albums. Quality of photos and videos is exactly same as stock camera app. The panorama mode for photos is probably the most intuitive implementation I have seen.

Great Camera & Awesome Features! I paid the 5.99 is that a one time payment? It did not say anything about limited time just said premium. *****Added Note***** Thank you for responding so quickly! That is excellent news! This is the best camera app I've ever used and have tried several that were much much higher in price than this one. You guys rock! You develop an awesome product with great filters and addons of which are very easy to understand and use. All of this at an unbeatable price!!!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Preston. Yes, this is the one-time payment, which is the perpetual premium license. So you don't need to pay again anymore, and you will get all future new options for free. Cheers.

scraped_reviews.content: A very good app, with almost every option available to be manipulated on the fly eg. Iso, exposure, zoom, at lock etc. Moreover, it has on the fly effects such as fish eye lens. However, highest resolution is locked and only available to payers. However open camera app has all the basic features without asking you to pay 8 Euros to unlock any basic feature.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello. As Pixtica is a premium app, the reason the resolutions are locked, is to allow using and trying all the app features, camera modes, editors, etc. If other hand we unlock the max resolutions, then we would have to lock everything else, allowing only to use the very basic functions such as photo and video, but nothing more at all. Regards.

scraped_reviews.content: 4 stars only because the gallery lacks the ability to move/copy photos from one album to another (and which I hope they will implement soon), otherwise I would only use this app, it's one of the most well-equipped and versatile around. Bought years ago, it has never let me down.

The App is very nice although the colouring could take advantage of the onboard flash but there's a lot you can do with the pro options which makes it ideal for those who love working with high definition photos. The mic really pops with this app as well.

Clarify me one thing please. I tried at start with my pixel 7 pro, and i managed to click 2-3 photos in manual shutter speed. But soon enough, that stopped working.. as pixel doesn't provide manual shutter speed option in their camera.. is it possible to get manual shutter speed? Or was that just a possible fluke? i really miss manual shutter speed on this phone
scraped_reviews.replyContent: If you were able to use the Shutter Speed control but no longer see it, then check different camera modes, lenses, and resolutions. Pixtica allows Shutter Speed only when the current configuraiton supports it, so your must find in your device which lenses/modes/resolutions are the ones allowing it, as such option is specific to each hardware.

scraped_reviews.content: I loved Pixtica on my Pixel 8 for a week. Images not oversharpened as in the native Pixel 8 app. Ditto when zoomed. No zoom slider over viewfinder--big plus. White Balance and Exposure worked well. But manual controls stopped working in the Pixel 8. As soon as I go into Manual Mode, the viewfinder screen goes black. I assume Google changed something that has caused a problem for Pixtica, at least for the Pixel 8. I hope the team at Pixtica will be able to find a way around this! Using auto now.

I used this application from last 1 month. After I purchased pro version and then after few days they removed 12 mega pixel and 9 pixel settings from the setting. I have mailed them multiple times but no reply found. Even it is hard to connect with customer care. I suggest all of you that please don't purchase the pro version.

Not sooooo impressed by this app for now. It works on my Pixel phone, which is already an achievement for some people. Would have liked more filters to choose from and more detailed settings for each filter. I used to the 1998Cam app before and looking for an replacement. Not sure Pixtica is the one....

After trying numerous different camera apps, this one was a clear standout. No junk features and has by far the fastest response in photo time. Plenty of useful modes, although the QR code reader could be integrated a bit nicer. Only real gripe I have with the app is it doesn't seem to want to play nice in video mode when changing to a different sensor (crashes, but that's probably fixable in time).

Yours is a really nice app. With all the filters plus saving photos to external SD card is the real icing/cherry on the cake. Could you also please try to add support for capturing photos in HEIC/HEIF format ? Also , I think Cameringo camera app developed by you has wayy more filters plus the filter labels are cartoon-ish here.

This camera app that has a 60 second long shutter is a joke. It doesn't open the shutter that long, it took only 2 seconds and the shutter is done. Luckily, i did not purchase the license for this and i uninstall the app immediately. TAKE NOTE: THIS IS NOKIA 6.2 on Android 9 WITH A PRO MODE THAT WORKS NORMALLY. I accidentally got tempted with your 60 seconds shutter on your camera app which is FAULTY ON YOUR SIDE. I don't need suggestions üôÑ
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Unfortunately your device manufacturer has restricted your specific model, allowing only your stock camera app to use your max shutter speed. If you try other apps from Google Play, you'll see that none can use your maximum speed. The shutter speed limits are set by device manufacturers, never by apps. Pixtica will always try to use the max allowed

scraped_reviews.content: Edit: So far, none of the apps I've tried go higher than 1/10s. Only stock can go beyond 1/10s up to 10s. Same as someone else had mentioned before. On my S9+, the different shutter speeds doesn't make any difference whatsoever. It only takes a couple seconds at most to snap the picture.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: As you have already discovered by trying different apps, this is a Samsung's restriction. Samsung allows only their stock camera app to use the max shutter speed. Placing a bad review to us will not solve anything at all, as developers can't go around manufacturers restrictions. The solution is that Samsung allows full camera access to all apps.

scraped_reviews.content: I like the name, icon and the App. Overall, a fun, pleasing UI, but with a multitude of controls and extras to tweak and get your best shots, videos, panaromas and GIFs along with a built in editor to edit them or paste stickers, text or whatever you fancy. It supplements my RedMagic 3's default camera. ‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠êüëç

To the dev team: One thing I am missing is when you open a photo in the gallery it should go to crop by default and should have share option for that cropped photo, without having to save it first. Otherwise, fantastic app! 5*

Not satisfied with application, its worst than stock camera application, doesn't worth buying subscription. When buying this application it shows you will get full resolution but after buying it only shows up to 12 MP and my device have 48 MP triple camera setup, even it does't have any portrait mode, decent image and video quality.... It's total waste of money. Even though I wrote an email a month ago the developer didn't reply till date.... And can I ask for refund please !!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Pixtica can support over 100MP, has Portrait mode, and shows at all times the resolutions you'll get in Premium. If your max resolution doesn't appear in the list, then it will not appear after purchase either. Unfortunately your device manufacturer is restricting the 48MP of your specific device model to be accessible only by your stock camera app

scraped_reviews.content: Manual mode is really confusing. If I select color balance, brightness jumps to auto. And the reverse also. HDR is always too bright and hazy. The interface is really beautiful and very well thought out. The crop function works very well. I might reinstall it just for that!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi. Changing either the ISO or Shutter Speed will reset the Exposure back to Auto, and vice versa. This is the expected behavior, as in photography the Exposure can never be set together at the same time with the ISO and/or Shutter Speed, so they have to reset each other whenever they change. For HDR, please try the "Lite" preset. Best wishes.

scraped_reviews.content: I paid for premium because the features were nice and the watermark on images and videos is trash... For some reason, however, filming in selfie mode gives me weird tracers and makes the video nauseating and unwatchable. This doesn't happen when the camera is switched or in other camera apps, so I don't know why it's happening and makes the app virtually useless.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello, can you please clarify what you mean by tracers? what is a tracer? By saying tracers, do you mean that maybe you activated an image filter? If so, then clear such image filter. When recording a video either selfie or not selfie Pixtica does nothing special at all, it just asks to the image sensor to record video into a file and nothing else.

scraped_reviews.content: Can't lock in settings. Shutter speed is always auto and goes below 60, making all pics blurry. Should be able to set min/max, otherwise manual settings are pointless. Responding to dev: I can use them. They're not locked by my phone. Read my review again.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello dear user. To adjust the Shutter Speed tap the screen to open the manual controls, then select Shutter Speed and slide it to the desired fixed value to lock it. To reset it and go back to automatic mode press the "auto" button or close the manual controls. Best regards.

scraped_reviews.content: I really love this camera app. I originally downloaded it because my camera wasn't working and I wanted to see if it was an app issue or the actual camera (it was the camera, unfortunately). I ended up liking Pixtica well enough that I actually paid for it, something I've never done before when it comes to apps.

Volume up/down buttons on my headset works sometimes to trigger the camera.. While same up/down buttons at my headset RELIABLY controls the focus.. When chosen at the GESTURE section of the settings. In other words, shutter does not work reliably. Maybe App needs improvements to "denounce" the "volume" switch for the reliable operation because sometimes shutter activates when volume switch RELEASED ? Thank you for this great App.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello dear user. You can configure what the volume buttons can do. For this open Pixtica's settings, and in the "gestures" section configure as you wish the "Volume keys actions". About any separate headset device, we cannot say what the buttons will do as it would depend on how the headset's manufacturer has designed them. Regards.

scraped_reviews.content: It's a great alternative to the stock, and enhances the experience with bunch of features. Unfortunately, the app doesn't seem to apply filters, at least not on my device. The images appear unaltered in gallery.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thanks for reporting the issue. Do the filters fail when applying them as real-time filters in photo mode? or, when applying them directly through the gallery's creative editor? Also, please try restarting the phone, as the filters processor uses a service for background processing, and it could be that Android didn't start it correctly. Thanks.

scraped_reviews.content: no really worth the space on my phone. the only interesting featured looked like I could drop another imagine or even a gif onto another image in my gallery. but I didn't try it so I don't know if it actually does. if not, 2 stars

Quite a good app....but when you ve just taken pictures and want to see it right there. thru a tap on the camera screen..its suprising it displays quite a different photo from your gallery.. I don't know how this is possible. Please check this amomarly.
All time fast and easy to use. No More and complicated option. Clean and clear arrange of options. All type of options with good results. Basic but excellent. You should improve speed of HDR mode.

Most of the function of this app I'd really satisfied. But some features I can't use like slow-motion, and it will be good if the photos can be rotate easily than need to do the editing. I'm interested into subscribe it for one year ‚úîÔ∏è

Hi, nope that's not the issue, you guys added a timer to ALL functions in order to force me to update, then another "dev" blamed Google and said Google did it, which they didn't, also it wasn't from an unofficial source, I just extracted the APK and sent it to my other device which isn't online, as I said, I've already uninstalled on this as I won't be forced to update something I've paid for, cheers.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi. If you need help learning how to use the Timer function, please contact customer service to assist you. We also noticed that you are still using a very old and outdated version that is no longer supported. It is highly recommended to always use the latest version, and not a version so old and outdated as the one you are still using. Regards.

scraped_reviews.content: It's good, almost excellent. But I just want to control my exposure compensation, shutter speed, and ISO manually. Nothing wrong with SS and ISO ... But when I change my exposure compensation, my SS and ISO settings became Auto by itself. I don't like that.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi. This is the expected behavior. In photography ISO and Shutter Speed annulate the Exposure compensation and vice versa. You have to think of ISO and Shutter Speed as a granulated version of the Exposure compensation, therefore it is technically impossible to adjust the Exposure Compensation at the same time as ISO and Shutter Speed. Regards.

scraped_reviews.content: Although in video mode it has the best paused notification (very importaint to me) the App is a bit of a Con as the App restricts video resolution down to 480p whereas my phone is capable of 720p the App requires me to pay ¬£2.99 for a 1 year subscription to use the full capacity of my phone.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi. Pixtica also has a "perpetual license" with no subscription required. To use the maximum resolution and unlock everything, you need to buy the app. The reason you can download Pixtica for free is to allow you to try out some of the features, as we think this is a much better approach than asking to pay before downloading. Best wishes.

scraped_reviews.content: "Shallow Depth Of Field" is missing in the "Background Blur Option". "Lens Flare" is not present, but Bokeh, Light Rays & Leaks are present. Overall, it's a half baked app, can be improved a lot.

I came to give a honest review, this is the greatest of all time. Try it also, you will give your review without the app reminding you to do so, literally the best in the world with all Pro features like SloMo at 120FPS, Tiny planet, Best panorama ever and others

Enterprise license doesn't work if you have multiple gmail accounts added in your phone. App doesn't recognise the email address for which license has been purchased and keep showing trial version. Kindly help in this issue
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Please contact Google for assistance. All app licenses and email accounts are fully managed exclusively by Google, and not by app developers. Cheers

scraped_reviews.content: While the manual controls are fun (but _percentages_ for focusing??), and the few film effects are nice, I find limiting the max resolution to 4MP (upon purchase) with an 8MP camera is preposterous. The notification says: "If your max resolution does not appear, ... only your stock app has access to it." Funny, 8MP is available for Black Cam, EktaCam, HedgeCam 2, HypoCam, KultCam, PaperCam, Professional Cam, ProCamX, AND Cameringo+. (Yes, I have and use them all, and yes, some are quite old.)
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi. The apps you mention use the obsolete camera1 API, which is no longer supported by Google, but on some devices it allows access resolutions locked by manufacturers. Pixtica only uses the newer Camera2 API, as Google may remove the old Camera1 API at any time. Manual focus uses a generalized percentage due to manufacturers hardware fragmentation

title: Timemark: Photo Proof
description: Timemark Camera is an absolutely free timestamp and GPS camera. Timemark makes it incredibly easy to add time, GPS coordinates, logos and more directly to your work photos and videos, providing accurate photo proof of your work, detailed project log, and intuitive field reports. With guaranteed accuracy, simplicity, and versatile features, Timemark stands out among Timestamp Camera and GPS Map Camera apps. Unlock the power of info-rich photos to effectively showcase or document your work! Significantly enriched information: - Instantly add accurate date & time stamps and geotag while taking photos - Capture every detail accurately for professional documentation - Include map, coordinates, weather, notes, company logo, business card, tags, altitude, and more for comprehensive photo records Tailored for various industries and professions: - Construction: Document project progress with preset construction templates. Auto sync to cloud drives for quick photo management - Security: Snap photos for patrol reports. Share photos with location links to pinpoint incident sites - Field technicians: Take visual records with notes and map. Say goodbye to paper and pen - Delivery: Capture the proof of delivery in real time to ensure smooth pickups and reduce disputes - Services: Clock in / out and record break time anytime, anywhere. Showcase job done timely and correctly by tagging before and after photos - Retail or sales: Record customer visits, conduct store auditing with details and accurate timestamp. Efficiently manage your sales force - Business owners: Create branded promotional photos with logo, business card, and styled notes - Other industries: Customize our flexible, versatile templates for your needs. More industry-tailored templates and features are coming soon Accurate and trustworthy proof of work: - Get peace of mind from ultra-accurate, anti-tamper timestamps that display the accurate time in your time zone - Benefit from reliable location data backed by anti-fake GPS technology - Leverage unique photo code developed by Timemark Camera for easy tracing of the original photo taking time and GPS Efficiency at your fingertips: - Auto-name photos taken by Timemark with timestamps and custom notes, simplifying photo management - Auto-save photos and auto-sync to the cloud instantly without any extra clicks - Export work photos as KMZ files and view them on maps - Export photos as PDF or Excel for reporting - Generate timesheets with attendance tracking to easily calculate work hours Reliability you can count on: - Easy to use, no training needed - Compatible with older phone models - GPS can still be captured without internet and photos auto upload once back online „ÄêContact us„Äë Feel free to contact us if you have any problems or suggestions. E-mail: timemarkofficial@gmail.com Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/timemarkofficial
descriptionHTML:
Timemark Camera is an absolutely free timestamp and GPS camera. Timemark makes it incredibly easy to add time, GPS coordinates, logos and more directly to your work photos and videos, providing accurate photo proof of your work, detailed project log, and intuitive field reports.

With guaranteed accuracy, simplicity, and versatile features, Timemark stands out among Timestamp Camera and GPS Map Camera apps. Unlock the power of info-rich photos to effectively showcase or document your work!

Significantly enriched information:
- Instantly add accurate date & time stamps and geotag while taking photos
- Capture every detail accurately for professional documentation
- Include map, coordinates, weather, notes, company logo, business card, tags, altitude, and more for comprehensive photo records

Tailored for various industries and professions:
- Construction: Document project progress with preset construction templates. Auto sync to cloud drives for quick photo management
- Security: Snap photos for patrol reports. Share photos with location links to pinpoint incident sites
- Field technicians: Take visual records with notes and map. Say goodbye to paper and pen
- Delivery: Capture the proof of delivery in real time to ensure smooth pickups and reduce disputes
- Services: Clock in / out and record break time anytime, anywhere. Showcase job done timely and correctly by tagging before and after photos
- Retail or sales: Record customer visits, conduct store auditing with details and accurate timestamp. Efficiently manage your sales force
- Business owners: Create branded promotional photos with logo, business card, and styled notes
- Other industries: Customize our flexible, versatile templates for your needs. More industry-tailored templates and features are coming soon

Accurate and trustworthy proof of work:
- Get peace of mind from ultra-accurate, anti-tamper timestamps that display the accurate time in your time zone
- Benefit from reliable location data backed by anti-fake GPS technology

title: Google Maps Go
description:
Google Maps Go is the lightweight Progressive Web App variation of the original Google Maps app.

This version requires Chrome (if you do not wish to install Chrome, please use www.google.com/maps in your browser instead).

Taking up 100 times less space on your device than the full Google Maps app, Google Maps Go is designed to run smoothly on devices with limited memory and on unreliable networks without compromising speed to provide your location, real-time traffic updates, directions, and train, bus, and city transit information. You can even search and find information about millions of places, such as phone numbers and addresses.
‚Ä¢ Find the fastest route combining two-wheelers, metro, buses, taxi, walking and ferries
‚Ä¢ Ride the metro, bus or train with live city public transport schedules
‚Ä¢ Step-by-step directions with route preview, helping you plan your trips ahead of time
‚Ä¢ Get there faster with real-time traffic information and traffic maps

‚Ä¢ Discover and explore new places
‚Ä¢ Search and find local restaurants, businesses, and other nearby places
‚Ä¢ Decide on the best places to go by reading customer reviews, and viewing pictures of food
‚Ä¢ Find the phone number and address to a place
‚Ä¢ Save places you want to or visit often, and quickly find them later from your mobile

‚Ä¢ Available in 70+ languages
‚Ä¢ Comprehensive, accurate maps (including satellite and terrain) in 200 countries and territories
‚Ä¢ Public transport information for over 20,000 cities
‚Ä¢ Detailed business information for over 100 million places

____
Become a beta tester: https://goo.gl/pvdYqQ

scraped_reviews.content: Much better than the regular Google maps app. I find the color easier on the eyes than the regular app, and I love that the text actually gets larger when you 'pinch zoom'. feature request: I cannot share my location and have it work on someone else's phone. if this could be ironed out, that would be great. I still need to have the regular app enabled for location sharing to work.

I love this app. The speed traps are pretty accurate and crash notification is too. I would like some features easier to use like the parking spot finder. (unless I'm not seeing the right way) The speed feature is cool too. I cant wait for it to get more accurate. for example, showing exact lane your in and what lane to be in, showing more stores on the map, maybe saying "turn now" when you are right on the turn instead of "in 1/4 mile turn".

Stars, want to go, favorites, labels - these are good features in Google maps and i use them extensively. But I wish i could share a picture of what my map looks like in this app - practically can't see anything at all, only stars. I need to be able to hide the lists. At least in the regular Map app all lists (but not the private Labeled places) can be hidden. I need to be able to hide those too.

Insane, unnecessary, long crazy routes. Took me in such a roundabout manner, added 30 minutes for a typically 30 minute drive, so took over an hour. Tried to do same for another straight-forward trip, takes 10-15 min trip. Maps wanted me to go all the way up the freeway, turn around, come back this way, that way, for a ride usually straight from the grocery store. Very undependable, won't use again!

The worst thing is getting to your saved places, I should be able to click on destination where you type, and have a drop down menu that opens saved places, instead I have to navigate the main menu. Then if you want to save a place you can't figure out how, because there's no simple button for it like there should be. I recommend transit app over this

Bad experience. started on the right route then gave directions as if for a shortcut, but took minimum of 15m into v.poor single track roads !at night! thru the fields back to nearly where it had directed me off. this isn't the first occasion, but before it was on routes known to me, so turned it off. where useful is advising how many miles to go, & time.

Google Maps Go is a lightweight, fast alternative to the full Google Maps app. It loads quickly, uses less data, and works well on older or low-end devices. Key features like navigation, search, and directions are still accessible, though some advanced tools are limited. Ideal for users who need essential mapping functions without the bloat. Overall, it‚Äôs efficient, reliable, and perfect for everyday navigation on constrained devices.

Yeesh!! The reviews are bad, a lot of one stars. I've used it forever so much it went hidden on my phone; just resurrected it and surprised me with these forcefully polite screens telling me I had to turn on timeline. No choice. That's where we are, huh? No more choice. Not even a hidden screen to give your permission to blindly. Too bad I remember the day we had privacy and could protect it. Now we've forgotten and that the way these folks wanted it. The day has come. some time ago.

App is far cleaner and less cluttered than the full fat Google Maps app, and as a result is far easier to use. There are no news popups from what I can tell, so I can just tap the buttons to drive or train. UI is also far prettier and more modern looking than the full fat Maps app.

It took a long time for the app to load and what more disappointing is that for you to be able to do a navigation, you have to download the somewhat add-on app navigation go for it to work. it would be more great if they make it one and compress the file size so it wont be difficult to users to download two seperate apps to make it all work.

I have used Google maps for years and this app gets worse and worse. It crashes often, location is off, navigation regularly adds unnecessary time to drive. I have low expectations and do not expect an app to be perfect by any means but it's consistently frustrating. Works as desired only on occasion. Uninstalling

Effectively requires the additional 'navigation for Google Maps Go' if you aren't going to be looking at your screen while not knowing where you are going so you can try to figure out when to turn. Many turns have been missed before I knew the additional package was needed. Even then, it is far lighter than the bloat that is now Maps and its serving of 'these people paid us a lot, we recommend you go here' constantly taking up screen space. Use this with the additional pack to use for nav.

Definitely going to be uninstalling! This was one of the many, "pre- installed" apps that came on my phone. I was all for its, "smaller app, so low amount of storage used" and the " 'lite' 'go' saves you data".... that would be great, if you could actually use the app when you really need it!! It never said anything about the route, nor brought up the map to get to the destination!! It wouldn't even let me use the official Google Maps, it would take me back to this one, that doesn't work!

I tried this app because the regular Google Maps app takes up too much ram on my phone to run smoothly, but when I actually tap to start navigating, it just opens the other app. I thought maybe I could force this app to work independently by disabling the other app, but it just sends me to the Play store to install Google Maps. There's no point using this app, if it just opens the other app.

I hate all the glitches that it has lately it's going to cost someone an accident. also I hate that now you're stuck with strictly female voices they took away the male voice options. So now you're stuck with the female voice that sounds like she's severely intoxicated lol

The app has gone schizophrenic on me. I heard a different voice than I was used to. My default voice (while using this app AND Amazon Alexa Auto) has been a pleasant male voice. Now it's an annoying female voice. But, it switches during a trip. It will give one notification in the female voice, then the next notification could be in the male voice. Seeking help from Google is pointless. They show you how to change to other languages, not voices.

Every Google app I've used so far is junk. constantly recalibratung constantly incomplete and incorrect information. perhaps the techs can get off the screen and go to any area they don't know and use the app to better understand the garbage users out up with. I can do better with a paper map

The phone phone I have already had Google Go on it since it does only come with 16gb, all Google apps that are "Go" versions should already come installed

It shows route for the destination as well as roads to follow on the map but it cannot connect to GPS all the time and show me the directions. UPDATE: lol after the update it requires you to also have the full Google Maps app for navigation. It went from Go and Maps to Go and Navigation. Now it's Go, Navigation, and Maps?? So you want people that perfer minimalism or with lower spec devices to install 3 apps? I get Google wants our data but hahaaha what?? It's basically a progressive web app. It's not bad but there's no need to download this app through the store if you don't need navigation. You can literally open it up in a browser.

This is a similar to the online maps and work a little quicker than the old Google maps. However, this does have one annoying feature. Same as online, this app has a bar on the left hand side to input stuff which can be removed using a small arrow at any time but on the app this can only be removed before you input you directions. When trying to type in destinations, it jumps adding groups of letters stopping me from being able to type in the address properly. Some addresses are wrong but it wont let me send an update. On google maps on my laptop the location is correct on this app it is incorrect. When using a postcode only it often takes me to the wrong place, its better to use the first line of the address if it will allows you to type it in. Since updating a couple of months ago its gone from 5* to 1*

I checked all the location permission settings I could find, but I could never get this app to pull up my current location, and the rest of the‚Äã app is pretty useless if I can't get directions from my current location. The regular Maps app works fine, and even the Google Maps page in Chrome works fine. That surprised me, since this app is basically just a thin wrapper around the web app. Seems like a pretty serious bug. I eventually gave up and uninstalled it.

This app is great, but it has a few bad qualities. Pros: I think this app is so good for finding places to go, and it quickly locates where you are. Its great for biking, and it gives different ways to go, mainly the quickest. Cons: You don't get a clear picture of your location you search up. It sometimes searches the wrong thing instead of what your looking for. It lags and when you type something, per say, "Bridgewater" it will come up with no results, but If you search again, it will. -Leah

There is no worse than this. 1st, the direction window stops following the GPS' pointer. Everytime the driver should put finger on the screen to find the pointer. 2nd, the window is highly zoom-out. Again the driver should zoom-in to find-out exactly where he/she goes. These can distract the driver and cause sever accidents. 3rd, sometimes, getting directions gives us wrong starting point (different country--UK). Perhaps it receives the location where the Google server exists.

Extremely frustrating and terrible. Can't get directions, crashes all the time. Refuses to send location because GPS is "off" when it's actually on. Absolutely useless just go with the original Maps. That's much more worthwhile. Wish I could uninstall, but unfortunately I have the stupid Android Go operating system so I can't üôÑ.

Functions well enough, but there's no way to sign out of your Google account like there is on regular Maps. There's an option to temporarily switch to the browser incognito mode, but it will quietly switch itself back out as soon as you change any other setting (showing the traffic map, for example). It's very low memory and featureful, but this is not privacy friendly.

Very annoyed you can no longer navigate with maps but you damn sure get plenty of adds. To bad, it was a pretty decent app before. Just like Motorola, they got greedy and lost their quality along the way. When are companies going to learn, when you are doing pretty good don't try to cheapen the product or service. America is watching and we will notice. It always costs them more than they gain
