summary: Early payday & cash advances with no-fee mobile banking!

scraped_reviews.content: I'm giving it 1 star because when it comes to mobile check deposits, they lack in the worst way ever!! If you are like me and need your money same day or even the same week, don't use it!! I recieved a check from unemployment, I used the mobile deposit feature on the app and it says it's "under review". That process alone can take 1-2 business days and then another 5-7 to actually receive the money. I'm beyond annoyed and I will never use it again!! In fact, I'm closing my account once it clears
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hey there! We totally understand. Validation times depend on the issuer, so some checks may take longer. We‚Äôre working hard to make those funds available as soon as possible!

scraped_reviews.content: the app is fine and works well. however Varo has certain rules that might catch you off guard and lead to unforseen issues. For example, they have a limit on number of transactions you can make in a 24 hour period. if you exceed (like I did unknowingly) every transaction, transfer attempt gets declined. Basically they guard your money and don't let you access it when you need it. I would have never opened an account had i known that was the case.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi there, we understand you had a negative experience, and we would love to take a look at the issue. Please reach out via your registered email address to our customer support team at appreview@varomoney.com.

scraped_reviews.content: Displays weird error messages to the user: GraphQL Oops Something went wrong. Disrespectful. Now I was able to sign up, but the mobile app keeps logging me out and asking me to verify with authentication code through my email every time. This is super annoying and wasted my time. UPDATE: today, Oct 2, they actually blocked the whole app and the whole website from anybody using it. I can't believe it. They are holding my money and I can't even use it!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We are sorry to hear you are experiencing this. We‚Äôd be happy to help with getting back into an account! We kindly ask to reach out via your registered email at appreview@varomoney.com, so our support team may gather more information. We look forward to hearing from you!

scraped_reviews.content: Ever since they parted ways from using Zelle in their interface, I use it even less than before. They still offer an ok "High Yield" Savings Account compared to a regular one, you can find better rate for your savings account in other banks. But that's it, they do not offer a Bucket feature in their savings account like Ally Bank, no CD, no other extraordinary product to offer. You could do better.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We know this can be frustrating. We value your feedback and will keep it in mind for the future.

scraped_reviews.content: I only got to put in my login information, yet I wasn't approved. I can't even get to the dashboard , to input information like other apps, so what information was used to not approve. in addition was unable to hit the help button. well, Varo must be faulty, red flags from the beginning means, issues andmay have trouble receiving help. Makes me wonder was i not approved based on my location
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We are sorry to hear you are experiencing this with your address. We kindly ask to reach out via your registered email at appreview@varomoney.com, so our support team may gather more information. We look forward to hearing from you!

scraped_reviews.content: Best advised with the Line of Credit offering that even if you get approved, use it, and pay it back in full, never late, you can be refused to use it again. If your credit score drops or your direct deposit does, even temporarily or just choose to leave them for a different checking account, then they will pause your credit line just like their Advance. This is NOT a real line of credit, even though you get hit with a hard inquiry on your credit report like one.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hey there! We are sorry to hear you had a negative experience and hope to make it better! We kindly ask to reach out via your registered email at appreview@varomoney.com, so our support team may gather more information. We look forward to hearing from you!

scraped_reviews.content: Updated to 3 stars ‚Äî Better, but not yet at an acceptable level for the number all-service failures... Several "technical difficulties" recently that prevent transfers, or use of the card, in any capacity. Very frustrating because I can't purchase food for my family until this is fixed. ATM, debit, credit, and electronic transfers down. I guess this is what I get for leaving a regular bank. I had faith in Varo, but its happened almost daily in the last month or so. Varo, we are hungry.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hey there! We are sorry to hear about your frustrations and would be happy to gather more information. Please reach out to us via the registered email on the account to appreview@varomoney.com so we may be able to assist further. We look forward to hearing from you.

scraped_reviews.content: I opened an account and set up direct deposit. All was great, and loved the account. Then, I attempted to transfer into the account from my Bank of America account. Not sure why, but had issues more than once. Out of the blue, they closed my account with no warning, saying the failed transfer attempts seemed like fraudulent activity. Customer support did nothing. They absolutely suck for doing it out of the blue when I had direct deposit set up. Would give a zero if I could.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi there! Thank you for sharing your experience! We kindly ask to reach out via your registered email at appreview@varomoney.com, so our support team may gather more information. We look forward to hearing from you!

scraped_reviews.content: I received an email requesting documentation to verify my information. I did that. Did not hear a thing back. Called. The agent says they will expedite it. Days later, and my account is still suspended. This is very very frustrating. I have bills and credit cards and recurring investments linked to the account, and now it is all screwed up! Some of my investment accounts liquidated some of my stocks because the platform cannot access my varo account!!! It is truly insane.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We're sorry to hear about your experience. Here at Varo we follow banking laws and government regulations about how we operate. We take every precaution to keep the entire Varo community safe. Sometimes we‚Äôll suspend an account if there is something out of the ordinary happening and we need to verify more information. Please contact us for support.

scraped_reviews.content: No ads! Varo bank account is real and safe, very reliable! No overdraft, they do offer a savings account and you can get a varo advance for so much money after your account has been active for so long and you've had 1000 dollars in deposits in a month! I've had this bank account for about a year now and I have absolutely no complaints. They do not hold your funds, I always get paid when I should. Customer service is okay, they could be a tad bit better! Great bank account though! Thank you!

Direct deposits always late or missing for a while. I don't understand why. It's not my payroll provider when thousands of people are having the same or worse issues. This 4.7 score for the app is impossible. It's really unbelievable. I was hoping these issues would change. The amount of problems many are having is honestly scaring me. I had good hopes for varo, I'm going to have to find a new bank. It's unfortunate. Good luck to all other users.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi there! We appreciate you for taking the time to leave us your honest feedback! We are sorry to hear your negative experience with deposits. We kindly ask to reach out via your registered email at appreview@varomoney.com, so our support team may gather more information. We look forward to hearing from you!

scraped_reviews.content: I can't believe I didn't leave a review! Great bank card! This, Along with the Varo Believe Card, do wonders for your credit. You can borrow a decent amount of money if needed, and you can build up the amount you want to receive. Best thing is being able to switch money from checking to savings and vice versa at anytime, instantly. Been using Varo for about 4 years now, and any problems I've had they fixed quickly. Definitely download this if your still using NetSpend cards. Thank me later!

No 24/7 support. They ask you several questions, sometimes the same question, different ways when trying to cancel and close out the account. Mandatory to set up direct deposit through them to qualify for an instant advance, whereas other apps do not require that. Overall, it's like pulling teeth trying to close your account or get an advance won't be recommending this to anyone. You should be able to push buttons from your end and close out the account all by yourself like other apps.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, we're sorry to hear that and we would love to take a look at the issue. Please reach out to our customer support team at appreview@varomoney.com for further assistance. We are happy to assist you via phone at 1-877-377-8276 during business hours: Monday to Friday 08:00 AM - 04:30 PM MT, chat support is also available.

scraped_reviews.content: Their customer service leaves a lot to be desired. There have been at least 5 instances when I needed to speak with someone immediately and have had to wait on hold for over an hour. These have all been situations where I was unable to access my money through issues with the bank or card itself. I've encountered another issue this week that warranted a phone call. I was on hold for over an hour yesterday until the call was dropped. On hold right now for 45 minutes so far. Needs improvement!!!!!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We‚Äôre very sorry for the long hold times recently. We‚Äôre currently experiencing extremely high volumes. We understand the importance of contacting customer support and are eager to assist with your request. We appreciate your patience during this time. Please remain on the line or contact us at appreview@varomoney.com!

scraped_reviews.content: Used Varo for years and they have slowly took away features such as check writing, reduced interest rates, and eventually put extremely limiting limits on check deposit amounts and transfer amounts. I may have plenty of money in my accounts but they won't let me use it to pay for things. I fulfilled all of their "policies" by doing direct deposit, multiple card transactions, and having the account for years. But I still can only deposit checks below $2,000 and can't send more than that.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We are very sorry to hear about your experience. To best protect our customers‚Äô funds and comply with banking regulations, Varo has placed limits on some types of transactions, as defined in our FAQ page under: Varo Bank Account Agreement. Different limits apply for depositing, transferring and using funds. We have never offered checkbooks.

scraped_reviews.content: If I could give this app a lower score I would, they lost 50.00 that was sent to me, so I hope whoever got my money sent thru zelle, enjoyed it, then out of the blue after 2 years of being a customer the closed my account, I've never had an issue with them no reason was given and of course their non existent customer service, it says to sign on to your account to talk to customer service, how do you sign on when they have closed the account. They are a nightmare!!!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi there! We are sorry to hear the Zelle transfer was never received, you will need to work with the sending institution to resolve. It's always a difficult decision to close an account, it may be necessary to close an account in order to maintain the security and quality of our service. We wish you the very best moving forward.

scraped_reviews.content: Update: app can't update, "send feedback". Can't use this new app for 14 minutes now because it's"updating". Can't even log into the account, and I need to transfer funds from my savings to checking - not an option if you're logging in via browser! It's 4 am, so now I must go to an ATM. Considering what Varo pulled with the other app and closing all of our accounts, I'm going to stop utilizing their services all together.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Natasha, we're so sorry to hear of your issues with updating our app! Please reach out to us at appreview@varomoney.com if you're still unable to login, we're here to help!

scraped_reviews.content: I give this app 4 stars, because it's a great option to In person banking. It's one of the best online options I have found. I live how you can access every feature by a touch. I really like how you can send money, save money, and build your credit. Theres several things I'd add, like a calculator. There needs to be an option to cancel transactions. üòû should be an option to explain transactions like a receipt.

Instant transfers?? Only SOME of them. There's a glitch that is the most inconvenient & keeps my transfers from savings to checking in limbo for several hours. Need to get gas? Too bad! The app is experiencing "technical difficulties" & you can't even log in. Don't waste your time with Varo. It keeps getting worse, even more unreliable than previously was! Need custimer support? Guess you'll have to wait over 24 hrs for a response... time to go to SoFi
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi there! Thank you for sharing your experience! We kindly ask to reach out via your registered email at appreview@varomoney.com, so our support team may gather more information. We look forward to hearing from you!

scraped_reviews.content: The app is great but needs some more work if you ask me. The great thing is there are no fees! The only issues I have is that 1. It takes so long getting money back after filing a dispute, while the dispute is going on there is no digital card so you can still use your money that you do have. Also it does not show no tracking of new card coming. So basically your money can't be used until the new card comes which makes no sense. 06/13/22 They do not give you provisional credit!!!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi there. We are sorry to hear about your frustrations. Here at Varo, we are constantly looking for ways to improve and make a better bank for our customers. We appreciate your feedback and have routed it to the correct departments. If you have any other questions, feel free to reach us at support@varomoney.com!

scraped_reviews.content: The app was alright, but they seem to have left some sort of something behind on my phone after I removed it. Every 5 to 10 days, the Play store opens to the Varo app wanting to be installed. You could chalk it up to some other infection or problem, but it's hard to believe that if Varo isn't/wasn't the culprit, it would be the only app the Play store opens to. Look Varo, I know break ups are tough, but you need to get over it and let me go.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi there, we are sorry you have had to deal with this, we kindly ask you to reach out to support@varomoney.com so we may look into this.

scraped_reviews.content: I can't transfer any money out of my varo account. Tried everything already: Clearing the cache, storage, uninstalling the app and reinstalling it, unlinking and relinking bank accounts, calling customer service and they have no idea what to do and in the meantime I get charged for late payment on my credit cards because I don't have the money to pay! So basically I can't use my money I get from direct deposits. I have wasted so much time into this! That's so BS and so frustrating !!!!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We're sorry to hear about your situation regarding transferring funds. Please reach out to so we can assist at support@varomoney.com

scraped_reviews.content: I have been using Varo now for a couple of years and absolutely love all of the perks that go along with the free checking account! It is recognized as an accredited bank, no hassles when I need to link it with another platform for transferring funds for different things, all of the "fee-free" ATMs which seem to be everywhere you look, and especially the ease of using/navigating the Varo Bank Mobile app! There is so much more as well!! *AND NO..LOL..I WAS NOT PAID TO SAY ANY OF THIS** LOL..

I have had no problems with the app, no problems with customer service ( they are awesome), and no problems using my Varo card. As a senior, I often find myself lost as to how to navigate an app. This one is very easy, clear, concise instructions and immediate help should I need it. Everything was done exactly like they said and in the correct time frame. I love Varo Bank!!!‚ù£Ô∏èüê¨

The app appears to be promising, however, it continues to say that I am not eligible for an account. For someone who has numerous accounts that always remain in good standing, this makes no sense. The worst part about trying to sign up is the "no reason given" when the app says it is unable to create an account for me. Was it technical error? Perhaps my location? The world may never know. For this reason, 1 star it is :(
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Brian, we leverage intelligence from sophisticated technology which helps support our conclusions and final decisions. If the application has been declined, it did not meet our account opening requirements. We appreciate your interest in Varo.

scraped_reviews.content: Been good for several years with excellent service, but my checking account has been hacked twice within the last few months. The first time,I received my money back, the second time they said I was at fault, although both times, my credit card or debit card wasn't used at all. Varo Banking online app is the issue, not as secured as other online banking app. I removed my money from both my checking and saving account. Saving seems to be more secure though. Please be extremely cautiousüôèüôèüôè
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We are sorry to hear you are experiencing this. We kindly ask to reach out via your registered email at appreview@varomoney.com, so our support team may gather more information. We look forward to hearing from you!

scraped_reviews.content: Then using this app for almost 3 years, direct deposit for over a year. I had a very high vero advance painted on and all of a sudden. I'm only eligible for $350 less. My spending habit to the same. They said that they can't really give the reason that very, very unhappy. With that, trying to get a hold of someone as impossible as chat bot, not being able to talk to a human sucks
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hey there! We are sorry to hear that you had a negative experience with your Varo Advance eligibility and methods of contact! You are able to request a live agent through chat if additional assistance is needed. We hope to hear from you if you have additional questions regarding Varo Advance eligibility!

scraped_reviews.content: The app is very well set-up and has a user friendly interface. However, the customer service is abysmal. I've been trying to deposit a check for a week now, but the mobile deposit is down and employees refuse to explain why-they just repeat that they're working on it, over and over and over. Big red flag, and I can't do anything about it because it has "deposit to Varo" written on it. Will be closing my account here after I can cash my check. Shame.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Ashley. We would like to take care of this right away, however, when trying to locate your account we could not find you with your Google Play username. Can you please reach out to us at appreview@varomoney.com?

scraped_reviews.content: Have been a loyal customer for over 6/7 years now and am now closing my account. Their services are horrible, the advance amounts offered drastically change with out any prior warning, indication, or anything changing on your end. And their disputes and customer service are basically non-existent. I am switching to a discover or capital one online bank account, at least they do customer service right. Much better options that this "bank"!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi there, we understand that you have had a negative experience and we would love to take a look at the issue. Please reach out to our customer support team at appreview@varomoney.com.

scraped_reviews.content: I wasn't asked to do this review, and I normally don't go out of the way to do them, but this app really is as advertised. I originally got this banking app for a direct deposit place and quickly realized it worked very well. I always get paid two days early. After a couple months I looked into the believe program and started using it. After my first month my credit increased 64 points! A great tool and to me, a much better option then other secured credit cards that have high interest rates.

$32k is just out there floating in limbo. I verified the money was sent to the right account, I verified that the transaction was completed on Oct. 17th, but the money is still not in my account. The sender also verified that it was sent expedited and set for immediate deposit. Waited the 1-3 days that this bank told me ALL WEEK and now you're telling me 4 days and that I need to contact the sender. I feel like you're just going to add an extra day every time I ask where my money is.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi there! Thank you for providing your honest feedback! Varo post funds as soon as we receive the notification from the Federal Reserve! Varo account holders are recommended to reach out to the sender to gather a 15 digit bank trace ID from the sending institution and provide to support@varomoney.com for further assistance.

scraped_reviews.content: Was a great bank until they just randomly closed my account and gave me some cold, canned response about me basically deserving to get my account closed. It's funny seeing as I had just opened the account and didn't even make any purchases yet. I have no issues with any other bank closing my account before. BEWARE! Don't bank here there are lots of other better options than this. If you like waiting 2 weeks or more to get your money after they close your account then be my guest and bank here.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi there! It's always a difficult decision to close an account. We regularly verify financial activity to ensure we keep our whole community safe. In rare cases, it may be necessary to close an account in order to maintain the security and quality of our service. Please reach out at support@varomoney.com.

scraped_reviews.content: I've had the account for several years and haven't had any issues. I like using Varo Advance and the high apy. Overall, I like the interface. Until one day, I tried to log in to my account via the app and I get a message saying account suspended for 2 days while they look into suspicious activity. I contacted customer service. And issue was fixed for a few hrs when I got an email saying they closed my account and don't bother trying to find out why. I get hung up on now. Varo sucks

scraped_reviews.content: They are absolutely useless. My card was declining. You can't talk to anyone by phone and their chat is worthless. I dealt with them for 6 years...well I'm getting rid of them now.

The app itself is great, but I have noticed that early pay only happens with the first, maybe 2 checks. After that, I tend to not get paid until early to late afternoon on the day of payday. Waiting until payday MORNING makes sense, but not 3 sometimes 4 pm, especially when it comes to bills that do autopay. Another issue I'm having, is that I cannot seem to get ahold of anyone to figure out how to dispute charges. 1 time transaction turned into repeated, and I can't seem to get it fixed.

title: ƒ∞≈üCep: Banking & Finance
description:
ƒ∞≈üCep, Turkey's first and the most comprehensive mobile banking app, offers many new and innovative features for personal and corporate customers to ease their everyday life.
 
¬∑ Quickly define new customer PIN by using your Customer Number via ‚ÄúInstant PIN‚Äù option
¬∑ Easily perform a wide variety of banking transactions with English support
¬∑ Take a look at your financial status examining your assets and debt at first glance
¬∑ Access transactions to be performed with the simple menu structure and option to search transactions
¬∑ Easily withdraw cash from ATMs (Bankamatiks) using QR Code and from new generation digital ATMs (ƒ∞≈üCepMatiks) using QR code or Beacon technology
¬∑ Apply for a personal loan without visiting branches or signing a document via ‚ÄúQuick Loan‚Äù option
¬∑ Connect directly to ‚Äúcall center‚Äù from home page
¬∑ Find the nearest branch and ATMs via ‚ÄúNearest ƒ∞≈übank‚Äù option

You can make contactless payments with smartwatches with Wear OS 3 and above.

ƒ∞≈üCep uses ‚ÄúIncoming Call Information‚Äù (READ_CALL_LOG)  permission.
 
This is the permission required to provide information about phone calls made by our bank and possible suspicious phone calls.

ƒ∞≈üCep uses ‚ÄúFake Call Detection‚Äù (ROLE_CALL_SCREENING) permission.
This is the permission required to inform you if a suspicious phone call is made by caller id spoofing.

For your comments and suggestions, you can contact us through ‚ÄúContact Us ‚Äùpage on isbank.com.tr or ƒ∞≈üCepsocial media accounts.

title: Weather
description: Hyperlocal weather forecasts are here to help you own the day! Trusted by 100 Million+ users across the world, the Weather app by Swish will keep you weather-ready, every day. Key Features ‚úì10 Day weather forecast ‚úì48 hours rain forecast ‚úìMulti-layer radar maps ‚úì10+ customizable widgets ‚úìAir quality info ‚úìSun and Moon Tracker Accurate Forecasts Minute-by-minute forecast and precipitation up to 48 hours. Plan your days in advance with our 10 Day forecast. Radar Map Multiple weather layers and future radar maps to track thunderstorms, typhoons, hurricanes, rainfall, snowfall and more. Detailed Weather Info More than 15 weather data points that give you all the information you need. UV index, dew point, visibility, humidity, wind speed, atmospheric pressure & more. descriptionHTML:
Hyperlocal weather forecasts are here to help you own the day! Trusted by 100 Million+ users across the world, the Weather app by Swish will keep you weather-ready, every day.

Key Features
‚úì10 Day weather forecast
‚úì48 hours rain forecast
‚úìMulti-layer radar maps
‚úì10+ customizable widgets
‚úìAir quality info
‚úìSun and Moon Tracker

Accurate Forecasts
Minute-by-minute forecast and precipitation up to 48 hours. Plan your days in advance with our 10 Day forecast.

Radar Map
Multiple weather layers and future radar maps to track thunderstorms, typhoons, hurricanes, rainfall, snowfall and more.

Detailed Weather Info
More than 15 weather data points that give you all the information you need. UV index, dew point, visibility, humidity, wind speed, atmospheric pressure & more.

Health Center
Enjoy the outdoors with details about wind chill, moisture, air pollution level, and pollen count.
Air Quality Index: Get real-time air quality info for your area and plan accordingly.
Allergy outlook: Track grass, weed, and tree pollen.
Pollution level: Check pollutant levels of PM10, PM2.5, O3, CO, NO2 and SO2
Health tips: Get advice for general health and sensitive groups.

Beautiful Weather Widgets
We want you to see the weather your way. Choose from 1x1 widget, 2x1, 2x2, 2x3, 3x4, 4x1 widget, 4x2, 4x3, 5x1 widget, & 5x2 widget sizes in preferred formats.

Sun and Moon Tracker
Plan your day or night activities with sunrise, sunset, moonrise, and moonset. Explore various moon phases, including New Moon and Full Moon.

Additional features
Customizable Units: Personalize your weather experience by customizing units to your preference.
Multilingual Support: Choose from multiple languages to make the app more accessible to you.
Dark and Light Themes: Customize your app's appearance with dark and light themes to suit your preferences and reduce eye strain in low-light conditions.

100 million downloads and counting! Download the best android weather app now.

Need help? Feel free to contact us at oneweather@onelouder.com. We would love to hear from you.

Note: We may collect information from your use of the app that we may share with our partners to deliver personalized ads and improve our services. You may modify your choices at any time as explained in our Privacy Policy: https://1weatherapp.com/privacy/#rights.
summary: Your go-to weather app for accurate updates and hyperlocal forecast

scraped_reviews.content: this is one of the worst weather apps I've ever had, it's wrong more than it's right, they have a little bar with "tips" but the words don't fit on the bar so that's useless, yes I'm using the free app but the ads are insane but there's no chance I would pay for it since it's mostly wrong, the location setting is right has been right, I don't really go anywhere so it doesn't need to track, do something about the tips banner the message doesn't fit 99% of the time!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We apologize for any inconvenience caused. Inaccurate forecasts may happen due to location settings or refresh intervals. Please ensure your location is correct, background restrictions are off, and "Follow my location" is enabled. You can also adjust the refresh interval in the app settings. If the issue persists, feel free to reach out.

scraped_reviews.content: Great, well researched and accurate forecasts. NOT your below average cell phone weather app. This is the real deal. Who needs local tv weather "meteorologists" any more? If I took the time to really explore this very deep weather app, it was amazing. Be sure and check out the "show more" links, the live Radar Loop, the "Discussion" link, the "Short Term" and the "Long Term" links. Yes, the printed material and the icons could be a bit larger, but if I had to choose I'd rather have more info.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hello John,

Thank you so much for your review!
Have a great day and keep safe :)

it's pretty accurate easy to understand and set up but it needs more animation bells whistles clicks and clanking noises as well as access to options for operational function tweaks that probably are better left undicked with because it's running smooth enough as it is already ü§îüòØü´£üòâ

Vey accurate with the weather and its notifications aren't overwhelming they update you on conditions maybe 4 times a day and never with any annoying ads or anything thanks to the developers for building a great app keep up the good work!!!! üíØ
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hello Adam,

Thank you so much for your review!
Have a great day and keep safe :)

scraped_reviews.content: Doesn't seem as if it notifies when there's government weather warnings in the UK like my other weather apps do, and very sketchy rain notification on a razr40 more miss than hit! paid for pro to get rid of adds as well never mind
This app is easy to navigate, easy to read & on point with the weather in my area. if I don't get a chance to look at the news at least this app is reliable for the weather.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hello Denise,

Thank you so much for your review!
Have a great day and keep safe :)

scraped_reviews.content: I don't need push notifications to tell me about the weather in some far distant part of my continent or indeed elsewhere in the world. I allow location info for this app so it can tell me about the weather WHERE I AM.

scraped_reviews.content: I love this app, I sometimes wish that most exercises would be free or watch ads. I do wanna eventually pay for it because it's pretty cheap. I think there should be more yoga and workout options in my opinion. I also think we should be able to add friends on here so we can exercise together and see our progress it'll help with motivation and accountability.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello, thank you for your support and suggestions. Your feedback is very important to us. We will continue working to improve the app, add more diverse courses and useful features, and better meet your needs. If you have any questions or suggestions, you can contact us through Mine -> Feedback.

scraped_reviews.content: The start times for timed exercises are too complicated with the updates that have been made. It will say start, but then repeat the exercise name and sometimes it will do a countdown and say start again. It adds another 5 seconds to the timed workout and is very frustrating to know when to start. What it was doing before the updates was perfect. It did the countdown during the rest time, say "start", then started right away. If you chose to skip the rest time, the process was still the same.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, thank you for your feedback. The timing start method in the latest version is designed to give users a short buffer before the workout officially begins, helping you get into the right state. We understand that users may have different habits, and we will consider your feedback to further improve this feature for a smoother experience.

scraped_reviews.content: Not weightlifting app, I purchased this in error. I thought it was for weightlifting and immediately after i purchased it within 10 min I emailed them to let them know I want a refund. They claim they give you 7 free days to try it out. But they dont. they charged my account immediately. And the app is terrible. No where is there a settings account menu so you can cancel. I dont know how but I found an email and sent them a message requesting refund after 10 minutes of purchase.. no reply!.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello, we offer a 7-day free trial for the annual subscription. The discount offer does not include the free trial, and payment will be charged immediately after clicking. We have provided a detailed solution via email. Please check it at your earliest convenience.

scraped_reviews.content: I used to love this app. I use it every day. But, the second-to-last update has made the animated exercise timer inoperable. You listen to the 'start exercise' prompts and just keep going, because you never get the prompt to stop and rest, because the timer never starts in the first place. So to use it, I have to wait for the exercise to 'start', pause it, then unpause it, for the timer bar to start moving. üòñ My routine flow is completely ruined.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello, thanks for your feedback, we have noted the issue you mentioned and have reported it to the development team. We suggest you try switching to the real coach voice via "Mine" > "Sound & Music." Meanwhile, we will optimize this issue in future versions. If there are any updates, we will inform you promptly.

scraped_reviews.content: If you are struggling to keep going after 2min of workout on your own or have no ideas of what to do, this app is good. You click on a workout, and while there is background music, a kinda mechanic voice tells you what comes next, what you need to watch out for, counts down from 3. Theres always a break between excercises which you may skip or add 20sec. Overall, keeps you motivated with a sense of accomplishment :) "How will you feel when you reach your goal?" They ask in the beginning.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello, thank you for your recognition and support! We are delighted to hear that our app has been helpful in your fitness journey. With guidance and personalized settings, our goal is to make fitness simple, fun, and effective. We look forward to continuing to support you in achieving your fitness goals! üí™

scraped_reviews.content: I really like the app. It's step by step with a demo of how to do the workout. The only downside is that there are maybe 15 different workouts. Would like to see more including strength/weight training. Also the estimated time is way off. I skip the breaks most of the time and it is always at least double the time it says to get through the workout. I'm definitely not going slow either.

Very effective for its goal! Great workout options for beginners (and probably non-beginners üòÖ) - even for free! I do wish if was marketed a bit more function-focused. For example, "toned arms" are not why I work out, I just want to have strong/healthy arms. But that's just feedback and a personal pet peeve. Great app, thank you to devs for making it :)
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello, thanks for your recognition. We will seriously consider your suggestion and continue to optimize our app. We will also develop more courses to meet the needs of different users. Hope to bring you a better user experience in the future. If you have other questions or suggestions, you can contact us at femalefitnessfeedback@gmail.com.

scraped_reviews.content: Not as advertised. I loved everything about the questions they asked you where you are in fitness journey and such. However, I feel misled by a few things. One being asked to sign up for a trial to see my personalized plan, but then getting charged for the year without any clear way to cancel other than through the play store that recognizes it to be over AFTER the year sub. The app didn't have any recipes like advertised. And I felt the calculations are off.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello, we have explained in detail and provided a solution via email, please check it in time. If you have any other questions, please tell us via femalefitnessfeedback@gmail.com.

scraped_reviews.content: I am a big time procrastinater. I have not ever been consistent with my workouts and healthy goals. This app is so far the best thing, I have been looking forward to using it. Average 10 minute workouts, which I can easily find time for. And I feel the right amount of soreness from the various moves. I paid the one time fee to have the ads removed, but really, it was to support the app. Also, since I paid for it, I'm likely to keep it, lol. I'm not using a scale, not yet, but I FEEL good!

This app is amazing. As someone who has always led a very sedentary lifestyle, I could never seem to get into a proper exercise routine. But this app is fun and super easy to follow! One thing that I think would make it even better would be the ability to add notes to your calender every day. That way you can also keep track of other things (i.e. measurements, running distance) without using a different app. That aside, it gets a 5/5 from me.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Brianna, thanks for using our app and giving us your suggestion. We will take your suggestion seriously and try to talk over it with our team. If you have any other problems or suggestions, please feel free to contact us at femalefitnessfeedback@gmail.com.

scraped_reviews.content: This is a very useful app! I've used this in combination with a calorie counter app, and I've lost 5 pounds in my first week! I mainly downloaded it so that I could get back into shape, along with healthier eating habits, and I've loved the quick workouts. They can be chosen based on your skill level, and even the Beginner exercises can feel like a challenge (when you're out of shape)!

I really love the workouts on this app. I have hypothyroidism, major depressive disorder, and moderate breathing issues, so like 95% of the time I'm awake I am exhausted. Sometimes I have to pick and choose what daily activities to do because certain activities use more energy than others. The exercises on this app are incredibly low energy, but still offer results. I've been doing them for a week and have noticed my arms and butt are already tighter. So thanks for creating this app, yo.

I like it. Good for getting started. Lots of videos to demonstrate in case you don't know how to do something. It says there are recipes but I haven't found them. Only complaint in that there are too many pay walls. I already paid to get rid of the obnoxious commercials, and now there is another pay wall for additional exercises. I think if you paid once that should be enough.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, after purchasing the "Remove ads" feature, you can unlock some workouts without watching videos. On this basis, we have invited specialized coaches to design courses for more body parts. If you like, you can subscribe to our app to unlock them. Besides, we have launched diet plans in some regions and will promote them to more countries.

scraped_reviews.content: It's a really great app, works for my lifestyle and level of fitness, having short periods of free time and being a beginner. However, it does say I burned 200 calories after not even 10 minutes of stretching just my upper back and neck and shoulders... general rule for my weight and height is 100 calories for every HOUR. I like that you can exchange certain exercises for other exercises, but I wish you could make your own workouts.

I only recently downloaded this app, but I have found it to be very helpful so far. I am a huge procrastinator, and because of this I usually have a hard time keeping up with self care such as exercising. But it has been very easy so far. The ads are fairly short, and only occur to unlock an exercise, and at the end of the workout. The app has a lot of diversity, including warm ups, stretches, full body and individual work outs, as well as pain relieving stretches; also keeps track of progress

The workouts are a little limited in choices, but it covers all the areas I want to hit as well as in a shorter span of time than other workouts I've done (20 min or less versus minimum of 35min). The workouts are simple overall, and I definitely feel they work. Only negative I've found is that the notifications do not work when the app is closed. I dont get push notifications üòï.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello, sorry for the late reply. To save power better, our APP won't keep a long-time running in the background. This may be the reason why the reminder didn't come. But don‚Äôt worry, you can contact us at femalefitnessfeedback@gmail.com. We will provide you with detailed help and support to fix it. Regards, Leap Fitness Group

scraped_reviews.content: It is definitely one of the better fitness apps out there. You can customize the workout by substituting the exercises which is great if you have a bad back or knee. But I wish they allow me to add/subtract the number of exercises in the routine. I only give 3 stars because the ads shown are terrible. I understand ads are a necessary payment for the free service they provide. But they are horribly ostentious and sometimes even revolting. I wish they are more discerning and I know they can be.

The workouts are good but you have to watch ads to unlock most of them. Not gunna pay for the no ads version but there are so many ads in the free version and at inconvenient times it's annoying besides that it's an overall great app. Good workouts. I love the 30 day challenges and that you can customize the workout if you don't like or can't do some of them.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello, sorry for the inconvenience. Your feedback means everything to us. We will work harder to improve our app in this aspect to offer you a better user experience. You can contact us at femalefitnessfeedback@gmail.com if you have any other problems while using our app. We will be at your service. Regards, Leap Fitness Group

scraped_reviews.content: Very nice app, only ads I see are when you open the app and after a workout. Many different workout options, including daily challenges. There are some workouts you have to unlock with an ad, but they are very worth it. Something interesting I noticed after a workout is that they give you an ad for a totally different app used for working out. It's like they want you to go somewhere else lol. Very excited to continue using this app in the in the upcoming future.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Ellie, thank you so much for your kind word.üòä It encourages us and we will keep on working hard to bring you a better user experience.

scraped_reviews.content: I have used this app for a few months now, haven't had a single issue. Being a free app it has so many features for you to use. the workouts are as hard or easy as you want them to be, they have arm, leg, abs or full body workouts to choose from and different levels! It tracks your calories burned, enter in your info to keep track of weight loss and it sends you a reminder(if you opt to do so) to do your workouts. There are a few ads but never interrupts the workouts and it's only one.

Love this app! I've been using it for 8 months now. Such a variety of workouts. Timing is great. Love that it tells me how much calories have been burned at the end. But biggest downfall is there is no sign in page. Sometimes I do workouts on a tablet versus my phone and I have no way to connect the workouts. If I could log in on any tablet, computer, phone. I'm sure it would sync all the workouts and I could keep better track of my activity. Otherwise definitely recommend it üíï

Normally I hate working out alone but this app makes it feel as though you're being coached through the exercise. You can select the intensity you want which makes it really easy to build up your strength. If you're more experienced you can also shorten the rest time and if you're less experienced, vise versa. I like how there's a daily workout with a weekly trophy, it really motivates me to be consistent each day. Also, it's free! Most work out apps cost too much. I highly recommend this app!

I love the tips during the exercises, the countdown when there are 3 seconds left, the videos for how to properly do the exercises, the option of different levels (i.e. beginner to advanced), the calendar tracking, and more! I actually felt the burn after doing the intermediate arm workout and I have been looking for something like this for awhile.

While it does have ads, it's been the best app for getting back into exercises. With warm ups and bed exercises if you need to be lazy. And a voice that tells you when it time to start, halfway through and finished with each exercise. And a graphic showing how to do everything. It's a "exercise for dummies* sort of app. Highly recommend trying it. Also tracks weight and calories burned in the exercises. (With an option to attach to a Fitbit.)

Great workout app! I especially like the stretch routine to relieve neck tension and pain. Sure it has ads, but that's how quality apps can provide their content for free (grow up people). The ads never interrupt a workout and only take a few seconds to watch. I wish there were more workout routines focused on excercising for health instead of losing weight or getting a perfectly toned body. But it's pretty great for a free app.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, thanks for your feedback. Our app can not only help you lose weight and get in shape, but also help you relieve stress and keep fit. We offer many stretching and pain relief workouts, such as full body stretching, yoga, lower back pain relief, etc. We will also consider your suggestion and add more courses. Hope to improve your user experience.

scraped_reviews.content: 5/22: Response! After a 1 star review but at least I got something. Says they've launched personalized workouts on certain devices. Um, you can at least email it to me if you don't have the app setup yet, especially after collecting all that information. Be transparent on what devices it's on so your customers can make an informed choice on what they're getting. No comments were provided on the missing recipes. 1 star returned because the workouts are actually alright.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, we fully understand your feelings. We're working diligently to accelerate optimizations and aim to launch the features as soon as possible. Due to a high volume of feedback, our response time may be slower than usual. Thanks for your understanding, and we will continue to make improvements to provide a better user experience.

scraped_reviews.content: This is an easy way to help stay fit or get fitter without going to the gym. It has work outs for beginners as well as people who are more fit than me. If you don't have motivation to work out, this app won't work for you because it's very lax and free. All you need to so is watch a short add to unlock a workout routine... or you can pay $14.99 for no adds for a lifetime. All in all, I love this app.

It's fine. I like it, I use it, I add reps and weights to make it better. The calorie count is way off. What I don't understand is that each type of workout says something a number. For example, thigh advanced says "21 minutes - 29 workouts." I've never seen more than one workout for any but the full body challenge, so what does that mean? How do you get the other workouts? I only use this for some variety with structure since there's no variation in-app. Also, why is there just one arm workout?

Love this App!! It has all kinds of different excercises that I can do and it makes the gym experience more fun! Now I could get my body right for the summer time!üòÅüëçüèΩ Wish me luck! The only problem is that I can not sync my Spotify music to this app which I wish they can do so I can excercise while listening to my favorite music! Other than that, this app is the bomb!!‚ù§‚ù§üòÅ

I really enjoy this app. I count my calories along with it, but I have lost 11 lbs in two weeks with the full body month challenge. The workouts take very little time, usually 15 mins max. There are ads, but I don't have issues with it interfering with my workouts. You can also set yourself a reminder everyday to make sure you've done them. Give it a try!

Effective and does the job! I laughed at first, 10 minute workouts, ha! BUT THEY ARE WONDERFUL! The coaching is clear and encouraging. The exercises rotate their focus areas and routines. Enough for me to be a little sore the next day but not hurting so bad I cant move. I can do 10 minutes, break a little sweat, and move on with my day. Glad I find this app!

I really like this app for it's simplicity. Usually I enjoy doing a group class or going for a run to workout, but when I'm busy or have limited space, I like to use this to get a quick workout in. The advanced workouts are about 30 min, intermediate 20, and beginner 10 min. Skipping or shortening rest breaks between each exercise you can do it quicker and sweat more. I used this a lot while I was doing quarantine in a hotel room - no excuse to miss a workout!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Lorraine, thanks for sharing your experience! So glad the app is helpful to you during this special period. If you have any other problems or suggestions, please feel free to contact us at femalefitnessfeedback@gmail.com. Best Regards, Leap Fitness Group

scraped_reviews.content: I swear by this app! They have a large variety of exercises and a video to show how to do each one. The app leads you through face-slimming exercises, post-run stretches, bikini workouts, and so much more! The only thing I would change about this app is their fitness scale. I am a little younger, so I am still growing. It tells me that I am underweight because I am taller than most people who weigh about 98 pounds. If they could put age into consideration, 5 stars!
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hi, thanks for your feedback. We will take your suggestion seriously and try to make some improvements in this aspect.  If you have any other problems or suggestions, please feel free to contact us at femalefitnessfeedback@gmail.com. 

Best Regards,
Leap Fitness Group

scraped_reviews.content: I love this app. It has short and sweet workouts so I'm always motivated to exercise knowing it'll only take 10-15 minutes AND I feel the burn every time so I know the workouts are targeted to burn more calories in a shorter amount of time. It's perfect for what I need. 4 stars instead of 5 because it needs more variations in the workouts and stretches. I'd love a few more stretches at the end of the total body workouts. And it could add a calorie counter feature or something similar.

Variety of exercises is excellent. Can choose arms, legs, butt, and, face, or full body. Different experience levels (beginner, intermediate, advanced). I dislike the ads before exercises that are specific body sections, which display before and after the routine (every time routine is selected), but this can be changed by paying for app. Overall, I truly like this exercise app and use it daily, doing multiple routines, and feel more flexible and energetic with a more shapely body.

Does the job, I'm getting stronger each day! Some exercises will feel awkward at first but you'll learn the more you try it; just do it the way you can and as long as you're using that muscle, you'll become stronger. 10/10 app. If you're paying for a workout app right now, delete it and get this instead! There's payment options for extra features/no ads. Besides that it's great! Love this app! üëçüëç

Despite the fact that it looks like some generic workout app, it gets the job done pretty well. Using this app I've managed to get visible abs after using it for some time. It has a couple ads but to a reasonable degree seeing that it's a free app. My one critique is that it doesn't include options to mention any past injuries such as a dislocation in order for it to filter out some exercises. I tried out the splits training once but had to stop midway through since it was messing with my knee

This is the best work out app ever!! Im not over exaggerating!! If you're considering downloading do it!! This app will not let you down, its easy to use, is visually pleasing, isn't just for loosing weight but maintaining or just toning up, tracks your progress but also keeps you motivated, and there's different levels of workouts (which is a beginners dream)! Not only are there work outs for different things (butt abs arms etc) but there's stretches to! Thank you so much!!

Really enjoy the different levels of workout, and the variety so it gets changed up even when you choose the same type of workout. Very few ads. nice customization, like choosing your down time in between sets. And I like the simple narration when the sound is on, and the visuals. I don't think I'll be trying any other workout apps =)

There are adds but they're really not too bothersome. You can unlock more workouts my watching a 20-30 second add which is not any worse than YouTube, (am I right?). The feeling of completing a workout and getting the little "you rock!" at the end, along with the amount of workouts you've done and calories you burned is very gratifying! This has been a real motivator during the quarantine. (Balances out all the baking I've been doing). üí™üèª

Great free app. There are ads. Of course there is, it is a free app. But the reminders you set yourself, on your schedule, are super helpful. Each work out day you choose the area you want to continue on. Each day gets a little more. Each day is a variety of timed exercises with count downs for your convenience. Thanks! This is exactly what I was looking for!

As someone who is Athletic and wants to do exercise again after a long while. It is easy to start simple and has more difficult stuff. Excercises make an impact and it is customizable with how long or difficult. Once you do a few of the selections. You can pick the right ones. I do change a few exercises and let the timer run to count it. Ex. Pushups for planks, wall pushups etc. Similar exercises to the ones shown. It helps keep it the same for progress.

They promised a tailored workout, and a 7 day free trial. I agreed to that. However, immediately my card was charged for the full year, and there's no tailored workout to be found anywhere. Also, I specifically said bed, not floor, and nearly all there is floor exercises. This app is fine, if free. I emailed them, and auto reply says NO REFUNDS. Tired of apps that lie, then say NO REFUNDS. Great business model. Google should kick them off PlayStore. Will dispute w bank.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello, do you mean that Google rejected your refund request? We have explained in detail and provided a solution via email, please check it in time. If you have any other questions, please tell us via femalefitnessfeedback@gmail.com. We will be at your service.

scraped_reviews.content: Really angry about this purchase. I didn't read enough reviews first. There is no personalized or tailored plan, just a list of many random exercises to choose. I was looking for an app that gave an exercise PLAN for my age, weight, and body type. This is not it. Even with the paid version, THERE IS NO PERSONALIZED PLAN. Re: Your reply Yes, I already paid for the 1-year subscription. That's why I'm angry. I can't even choose a weight loss plan.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, we fully understand your needs. We provide many workouts to help you lose weight, such as Fat burning hiit, 7 Min classic, Step-by-step weight loss, etc. We will also continue to develop more personalized exercises and features, hoping to bring you a better experience. Any other questions, please contact us at femalefitnessfeedback@gmail.com.

scraped_reviews.content: Major plus to this app is being able to customise the amount of exercises, and being able to pause. I started using this during the beginning of the covid lockdown. I have an enlarged heart, and the doctor says that I should try 30 minutes of exercise a day. Though they probably tell everyone that. Dumb, but this helped me through lockdown, as I was living alone.

I absolutely love this app. During the pandemic I started to gain so much weight and felt so bad about myself. It wasn't until a few weeks ago that I decided to change this. Combined with a healthy diet, this app has helped lose around 9 lbs in 3 to 4 weeks. I enjoy the training, the workouts...everything. I personally don't like to exercise much, but I feel pretty motivated to keep doing these workouts everyday, so, thanks for that! Looking forward to keep using this app ‚ô°.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hi Ana, so glad that our app can motivate you to workout and help you to lose weight! We will keep on working hard to bring you a better user experience. If you have any other problems or suggestions, please feel free to contact us at femalefitnessfeedback@gmail.com. 

Best Regards,
Leap Fitness Group

scraped_reviews.content: A convenient app for exercising, I don't have to count the numbers while working out and every workouts set up clearly! Yet I kinda need a workout for my fat calf and some other parts of body, but I like the entire body workout, it's clear and great! And I can't find a place to connect my gmail or sync other apps except google fit which I don't use. On the other hand, the calories we consumed in these workouts are always more than I thought but Idk if it's right or it's eexaggerated.

Excellent! i pay for the upgraded version every year, its more than worth it. the app is progressively getting better each year, it has helped me go from a very sedentary life to a moderate workout level. i love that there is a variety of workouts that goes from very very easy to quite difficult. the only thing i would like to see is a maybe a category dedicated to weightlifting with and without equipment outside of maybe needing a chair or bench.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello, thank you very much for your detailed sharing and long-term support. We highly value your feedback and will work to add more types of workouts to better meet your needs. Please stay tuned. If you have other questions or suggestions, please feel free to contact us at femalefitnessfeedback@gmail.com.

scraped_reviews.content: It's just ads on tops of more ads. I can't even open the app or touch a single thing without having to watch several full length ads and be pressured into buying premium. Added to that, it straight up won't let me even access content at all (or continuing one I've already started) without paying for it. I get the need for ads to stay free, but this is way too much. Uninstalled.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, we offer many free courses such as the 7x4 Challenges for full body, arm, abs, butt, etc. Some workouts can be unlocked by watching a video completely. To meet the needs of more users, we have launched a premium version. You can decide whether to subscribe as needed. We will continue to optimize the ads issues to bring you a better experience.

scraped_reviews.content: Great App, easy to use. Simple exercises, I really like the warm up and cool down with each workout. I look forward to the stretching at the end the most. One thing to note: it has you put in your height and weight. It has a BMI calculator built into the app. My goal was not to focus on weight but to gain strength. I would rather not make my weight a goal as I want to gain muscle mass. So the BMI chart I dont like. Also it has banner ads for gastric surgery. Still I great user friendly app.

title: VK: music, video, messenger
description:
VK unites tens of millions of people by offering unlimited features for communication, entertainment, business and sharing news from anywhere around the world. On the app, you can listen to music, watch videos and clips, keep track of your health, play games, and shop.

Stay in touch with friends and family. In the messenger, you can chat in group chats and private messages with both friends on VK and people from your phone‚Äôs contacts. Bring together an unlimited number of people in video calls, all for free with no time limits.

VK has social media solutions for a wide variety everyday situations:

- Discover everything one of the largest social networks in the world has to offer. Meet new friends and join online communities. Stay close with faraway friends using the messenger and VK Calls.
- Listen to the music you love and easily find your new favorite songs thanks to personalized recommendations.
- Watch and create VK Clips, short vertical videos covering a wide range of themes.
- Enjoy live streams, share pictures, play games, and read interesting news in thematic feeds.
- Learn something new in podcasts and upload your own.
- Keep track of your health and stay in shape. You can also compete with friends to see who can take the most steps per day, thanks to integration with your device. Take a long walk and make your way to the top of the leaderboard!

Terms of Service: vk.com/terms
Privacy Policy: vk.com/privacy

title: Rocket Money - Bills & Budgets
description:
Join over 5 million members in using Rocket Money, the all-in-one personal finance app.
Save more, spend less, see everything, and take back control of your financial life.

‚ÄúOne of the best personal finance apps we've tested.‚Äù - PC Mag

KEY FEATURES


- Find and cancel forgotten subscriptions
- Lower your bills and let Rocket Money negotiate on your behalf
- Track your monthly expenses and avoid overdrafts
- Create a budget that works for you 
- Put your savings on autopilot
- Track and grow your net worth 
- Monitor your credit score
- Bank-level security and privacy

YOUR ALL-IN-ONE FINANCE APP

Rocket Money makes it easier than ever to manage subscriptions, lower your bills, and stay on top of your spending. The app tracks all your accounts so you don‚Äôt have to ‚Äì just link them once and let the app handle the rest.


MANAGE YOUR SUBSCRIPTIONS ALL IN ONE PLACE

Put money back in your pocket by canceling your forgotten subscriptions. Rocket Money instantly finds and tracks your subscriptions, and helps you cancel them within the app with just a few taps.

GET BETTER RATES ON YOUR EXISTING BILLS

Our concierge will identify bills that can be lowered and negotiate on your behalf for the best rates possible.

CREATE A BUDGET THAT WORKS FOR YOU

Set up a budget that automatically monitors your spending by category and keeps you on track towards your goals.

PUT YOUR SAVINGS ON AUTOPILOT

Rocket Money makes saving money effortless. Choose your savings goal, pick a preferred frequency and amount for us to set aside, and watch your savings grow without even thinking about it!

UNDERSTAND AND GROW YOUR NET WORTH 

Get a full picture of your assets, debt, and investments in one place. By tracking everything you own and owe in one place, your net worth helps you measure and monitor your financial health over time.

https://www.RocketMoney.com/privacy
https://www.RocketMoney.com/terms

8455 Colesville Rd Suite 1645
Silver Spring, MD 20910

scraped_reviews.content: This app is a lot better than I'd hoped it would be, it has genuinely helped me save 100s, probably 1,000s by now! Being able to see exactly where every penny goes and sorting it into categories really helps you get a visual on your finances, on where you can improve and on where you need to spend less. And on top of that, they let you choose how much you pay for your subscription per month! That truly shows good character I believe, love this app and the support team (they are great) 10/10

There is something to be said about a piece of mind when it comes to personal finances. Rocket Money places all your bills and spending into easy to read categories. I like that once the initial set up was done, the numbers didn't have to be entered manually. There is so much helpful advice on budgeting and credit use. No pressure to use any of the programs, or pay for subscriptions. Oh, they also kill subscriptions you don't want. The best sell for me was saving 80 dollars car insurance!

The app is good for a one-stop look at your accounts. It claims it can lower your bills, but that feature has never once been successful. It pretended to work once, lowered my Metronet bill by a bit, forced me to pay part of that saving, and then my next bill was increased by the same amount. I was charged for the app doing nothing.

Rocket Money is a smart, user-friendly app thats helped me get a much clearer view of my personal finances. I started using it to track subscriptions, but I quickly realized it's so much more than that. It automatically detects recurring charges (even sneaky ones), help negotiate bills, and gives detailed breakdowns of spending by category- which has really helped me become more intentional with my budgeting.

Rocket Money used to be great but over time it has turned into another useless app with a yearly subscription that does nothing valuable. The credit score is inaccurate, budgeting doesn't work because it doesn't detect half your transactions, and they don't actually help with cancelling subscriptions or anything like that, they just have links that take you to the website to do it yourself. I was a happy subscriber for over a year, but now I've deleted my account and the app and will not return.
