title: Royal Kingdom
description:
From the creators of Royal Match comes a brand new match 3 puzzle adventure in Royal Kingdom, starring the extended Royal Family!

You‚Äôll meet King Richard, King Robert's younger brother, as well as a charming cast of new characters, including Princess Bella and the Wizard, to embark on a journey to build legendary kingdoms! Solve match 3 puzzles to explore new lands and defeat the Dark King & his army!

MASTER MATCH 3 PUZZLES
Test your skills and become the ultimate match 3 expert by solving fun yet challenging puzzles! Beat thrilling levels and overcome unique obstacles!

BUILD AND EXPLORE KINGDOMS
With the help of the Builder, craft a kingdom befitting royalty. Solve puzzles, earn coins, and unlock diverse districts - from the Parliament Square to the University and the Princess Tower.

CONQUER THE DARK KING
Defend the kingdom from the Dark King‚Äôs attack by solving match 3 puzzles - destroy his castles and evil minions to see him fall. Victory is one match away!

EXPAND YOUR RULING
Rise through the ranks and claim the top spot on the leaderboard, master your puzzle solving skills for generous rewards, and expand your kingdom by uncovering uncharted lands as you play!

ENJOY THE FINEST VISUALS
Immerse yourself in Royal Kingdom's stunning graphics and smooth animations. A puzzle game experience like never before - captivating and seamless.

What are you waiting for? Download Royal Kingdom and join the ranks of the noble adventurers! With hours of fun, challenging gameplay, and a magical world, this puzzle game is fit for royalty!
descriptionHTML:
From the creators of Royal Match comes a brand new match 3 puzzle adventure in Royal Kingdom, starring the extended Royal Family!

You‚Äôll meet King Richard, King Robert's younger brother, as well as a charming cast of new characters, including Princess Bella and the Wizard, to embark on a journey to build legendary kingdoms! Solve match 3 puzzles to explore new lands and defeat the Dark King & his army!

MASTER MATCH 3 PUZZLES
Test your skills and become the ultimate match 3 expert by solving fun yet challenging puzzles! Beat thrilling levels and overcome unique obstacles!

BUILD AND EXPLORE KINGDOMS
With the help of the Builder, craft a kingdom befitting royalty. Solve puzzles, earn coins, and unlock diverse districts - from the Parliament Square to the University and the Princess Tower.

CONQUER THE DARK KING
Defend the kingdom from the Dark King‚Äôs attack by solving match 3 puzzles - destroy his castles and evil minions to see him fall. Victory is one match away!

EXPAND YOUR RULING
Rise through the ranks and claim the top spot on the leaderboard, master your puzzle solving skills for generous rewards, and expand your kingdom by uncovering uncharted lands as you play!

ENJOY THE FINEST VISUALS
Immerse yourself in Royal Kingdom's stunning graphics and smooth animations. A puzzle game experience like never before - captivating and seamless.

What are you waiting for? Download Royal Kingdom and join the ranks of the noble adventurers! With hours of fun, challenging gameplay, and a magical world, this puzzle game is fit for royalty!
summary: Get ready to be a part of King Richard's glorious match 3 puzzle adventure!

scraped_reviews.content: I'm really disappointed...I saw the ad with the rock wall, the snake, etc. and I got excited to play that game. It looked fun. Imagine my surprise when I started playing and found out this is exactly the same format as Royal Match. That's deceptive advertisement. The mini-game (defense game) was different than Royal Match, but I wanted to play the game in the ad, not the game I downloaded.

I love that there are no ads and the game play is fun. I rated it low because I've gotten to a point where I have no coins, no power ups, and no way to get them but keep playing the same super hard level 30 times to maybe win ... or buy my way forward (I will not.) I just deleted the game. I play games for fun. Losing 30 times in one level is maddening not fun. If you want to enjoy a game more than a week, this isn't for you

Edit: 3 weeks later: not so much fun anymore. If you get stuck on a level, it's 900 coins to get 5 more moves & it doesn't increase beyond those 5 additional moves no matter what. Essentially, the game gets too hard & is no longer fun to play. ORIGINAL REVIEW: So far I really like this. It's very similar to Royal Match, made by the same creators. The big difference is the battles against the creatures, nice change!

Horrible game. Do not download it. It is a money pit & is also false advertising. It is nothing like the ad for it. Where is the king in the chamber with the fire getting close & you have to break blocks to put out the fire? These types of puzzle games are awful. If I knew it was this I'd have never downloaded it. I'm about to delete it & save myself a ton of money. No I did not spend a cent on it. Maybe that's why I can't win. It's another fake game that is nothing like the ads. Avoid it!

The game is fun and ad free yet some of the levels are so difficult that you run out of lives. To continue on the same day you are asked if you want to spend money for more. How is that a free game? I have been on super hard level 49 for over a week. it should not take that long to get through a hard level. You are doing it to make people purchase more items and that is unethical. I would rather you have ads than have the levels so hard.

fun game at first but then I began to notice the same trend as so many others. As you advance you will hit an impossible level, but never fear it is often accompanied with a discount offer on a power up package. They push the more costly packages the farther you get. I have won 7472 levels and stuck again. Absolutely impossible to pass this level. Never fear, I can now get a discount on the most expensive package of $99.99. So I am done. It is a fun game but I am over with the selling tactics.

the graphics are great, no ads, but the developers made this game ridiculously hard at some levels hoping you will pay money to play, and some levels you can try over 20 times to beat and not beat it, and then after so many tries, you have to wait 20 mins or more to play again if you lose. I'm debating deleting it all together. also beware, it's not like the ads they show you of helping the King, maybe once every 50 levels. it's deceptive.

Honestly sick of this game. You have to pay for everything. if you don't, you'll use all your coins and extras to get through one level, but you'll be stuck forever. If you get the super electro ball, you'll get to use it once, before you lose, and have to start over to earn it. The harder the levels, the more you'll just get stuck on levels forever.

it's fun and all, but I've made moves that Double click for power ups and dont get them..numerous times. this is turning out to be all about what you purchase. getting rediculous. Will play one level,over a period of time, to get frustrated. not worth it, no matter what tv celebrity advertises it. You will get stuck!! and unless you $$$$$, you get know where. unistalled!!

Fun game until you start having to pay to play. If you play casually, it's fine. Personally, since reaching a higher score, I've had to spend more and more money to pass levels. The algorithm is set so that once you spend money, the levels get easier for a while, but then you're stuck again. After about 40 tries on one level, it's apparent that their after another cash grab before you can move on. Won't spend another dime on this. Worse than gambling. You'll get through easily until level 1800.

For a free game with no ads, this is a great game! Honestly, I wish I could give it 5 stars, but the game mechanics are stacked against you in the higher levels. The rewards vs how much it costs to add extra lives or boosts are unbalanced, which makes progress feel frustrating instead of fun. I‚Äôve even spent $20 on boost packages, and those still feel light I‚Äôll keep playing casually, but unless the developers adjust the reward system, it‚Äôs going to be hard to stick with it for too much longer.

False advertising. As I was playing a game I got the advert of the king almost fetting boiled alive. i tried the little bit and was like, why not? after 62 levels, there has not been a single level like that. The game is fun, but I truly hate false advertising. Its annoying, so for that in itself, I give a 1 star. Your game is fine without making it come of as something it isn't.

As stated the game has great graphics. But if you don't buy anything, the game becomes very difficult to complete or you get cut with 1 move left in hopes you buy! Then if you buy coins your next move the game completes with 1 move. The dungeon escape is a joke!! If you want to blow away coins and free moves plays. SO IF YOU LIKE GETTING STUCK WHEN YOU PASS ON PURCHASES THIS THE GAME FOR YOU! BUT IT JUST PISSES ME OFF!! THAT'S WHAT'S WRONG WITH THE GAMING WORLD SUCK YOU IN, THAN DO WHAT EVER

I would give it five stars if the awarded coins amount increased when building a kingdom, because the cost to build only gets higher. I shouldn't keep getting paid the same $250 the higher I go, when the cost of building continues to increase! It reminds me too much of real life,lol. if I made it through 3000 levels and the cost goes from $100 for an item to $5000, and after completion, I'm awarded the same amount of items and $250!? What's the incentive to go higher.

This game is absolutely no different than any other game like this. It starts out easy. Then it's a bit challenging. By level 120 the game becomes almost impossible. They want to to buy power ups to help you pass levels. That's not going to happen. If I can't win anything back I'm not spending money on a game. I'll be getting bored playing the same level 50 times trying to pass it then uninstall get frustrated and uninstall the game.

All good until you get to approximately level 1800. At or about that point, Hard and Very Hard levels will increase in frequency, and you will get stuck at almost every level with increased frequency. Dont bother to try and earn the Electro Ball unless you're willing to spend money to keep it because you will seldom be able to win a level in the first attempt when you have the Ekectro Ball. Typical with these games. Once they think they have you hooked, they block you and go for money grab

This app just showed up on my phone one day, and I said heck why not I'll give it a try. It really was very fun for the first few hours of gameplay! Eventually though you get to a point where you have to pay to win, and this app does not have the content to justify paying my hard earned money, just for a few power ups to get through otherwise impossible puzzles. 1 star easily just for that fact alone.

It's a game of sabotage to entice payment... payment will have a short reward, then it's sabotage until it decides to present the conditions to be close to winnable. It's not about skill after the first couple hundred levels, it's just about enticing you to spend money as it gives you the illusion of possible winning when you end the level with just a couple more moves needed. For me it's just mindless entertainment when I need to give my mind a break...

Well... it indeed doesn't have ads. At least it has that going for it. But this whole game feels very artificially manufactured and the advertisement where the king is trying to escape some lava? 100+ levels and I didn't see such a thing. The game keeps getting more annoying (I suppose that's normal? I don'tplay puzzle games often anyways), the cutscenes in the beginning aren't found in later levels, and the "kingdom" you're building feels very meaningless. Everything feels really fake.

P2P. Typical match 3 game. The mini games advertised appear after level 1000 sporadically. Good luck getting that far. I am over level 2400. Waiting 2 weeks for new levels each time You can play offline. However if you don't join a team you'll miss out on a lot of Powerups/coin. DO NOT SPEND $$ on this game. This game is rigged, and if you like being frustrated, and stuck on the same level for days, go for it. The Bi- Monthly Card quest does not give out enough Gold Cards to receive the prize.

This game is fun, certainly addicting, doesn't have any ads, and seems to be quite playable without requiring any payment. However, I don't feel it's actually making me think at all. Yes, there's some mild pattern recognition and strategy, but is it really helping me in any way? I think not.

This game is just a money grab. It advertised as a fun ad free game. when you get to upper levels there is literally no way to beat them without making in-app purchases. I have been stuck on the same level for days now and cannot get past it, and will not spend money to pass it. Play for free until you hit the impossible to beat levels then delete the game and move on.

A good game should give the players an opportunity to stack up the rewards, at least to a minimum, not the other way. The game is unplayable if you don't have coins to spend, and the only reasonable way to get enough coins to pay for more moves is by spending real money. Then, after spending 900 coins for five moves, you get a reward of 20 coins. Who thr heck came up with this stupidity? This is by far not a good game, and I do not recommend it. Terrible!

I like the game and it's fun, but the low stars are for multiple times I pay to keep the game going after running out of moves, and the game won't allow me to make the move I paid for to finish the match. It's funny how the moves will lock up, but I'm still able to select a special move, but not use it in the match. I have to deselect it to try to continue. All the game will let me do is quit the game. This feels like I'm being scammed.

Gameplay not as advertised. Essentially Candy Crush with slightly different art: I played the first 10+ levels, all the same, but with some cinematics and some element of base-building that seems purely irrelevant. Overall would be a good alternative to CC, especially if you don't like King as a publisher, but I have to give it 1 star for the deceptive marketing.

not a bad game, but the advertisement was false. what made me want to try this game was the different situations the king was in and trying to solve how he gets out of a dilemma like being crushed with rocks. i have YET to play one of those scenarios. I am also on level 2800 at this point, so there have been plenty of opportunities for those to appear. Misleading marketing.

I'd love to give 5‚≠ê because I love the game! But, not being able to buy the extras without having to pay for coins (which I don't need) is not a good deal. It would be a great option for me (or 'us' as players) to be able to just purchase the plane and other extra stuff... without the coins. You offer the option to buy just a coin package, so why not just an option to buy just the extras? Otherwise, the game is a blast! üëë

I enjoyed this for a while. It is fun but, it's not satisfying when you get stuck for days trying to pass a level. Then two levels later it's a "super hard" level that gets you stuck again. 900 coins to continue a level is high considering you can't pass many levels easily and therefore are not able to make more coin to continue. Should be an ad to watch for continuing a level.

NOT for me as I will NEVER spend a single dime, EVER, to play a game..... no matter how much $$$$$ spent on advertisement with celebrity's endorsements......I'm sure they were well compensated.....was truly hoping that this was going to be a great experience but spent waaaaay too much time on the first HARD level before realizing that cash purchases were a requirement if I really wanted to move on......I did not! BYE BYE!

The game can be fun, but the ads are deceiving. If you're looking to play the maps shown in the ads, to save the king from monsters or drowning or rocks about to crush them, they never show up (or rarely). I am at level 220 and haven't had the opportunity to play this type map yet. Giving 3 stars as it's fun for a little bit, but gets stale fairly quickly and I don't like supporting the misleading idea behind the gameplay available to players.

This game is very addictive. I have, however, noticed that the further into the game I get, the harder the challenges are to win over other players. I then noticed a player i was competing was on level 2 thousand and something but had over 4 thousand first-time wins on their scoreboard. Tells me the game is full of bots to stop too much progress without the use of real money. It would be good if new power ups were added like new challenges are. Its good for now but will get boring eventually.

This game is a nice upgrade from royal match and plays well with some fun graphics and better "building" options. lately though, it has felt so like the managers of the game have upped the difficulty and made it almost impossible to get to the 6 game winning streak. multiple levels have taken days to beat and time and again it feels like they just don't want to give up anything anymore. I know it's hard to walk the line between fun and challenging but this has gotten ridiculous lately.

Typical Pay to Win Platform. Marketed as a free game, Royal Kingdom is playable for free until it isn't. Levels progress in difficulty until you need to spend actual money on power ups. I managed to play for free until Level 203, which I assume you can only win if you buy multiple power ups. If you want to spend money, you'll go far in the game, but for what? Not worth spending money on. I'd rather watch ads on a really fun game that's playable without buying upgrades than this game.

I downloaded this to see if the scenes were real (being chased by a snake, trying to escape from the rocks, etc.). So far, 100+ levels in, they are not. That's disappointing. I even watched the ad to see if there was a "not actual game play" disclaimer; there is not. Maybe those levels come later? (Somehow, I doubt it.) The graphics are good, there are no ads, it can be enjoyable, not terribly challenging. It's a decent game. You should advertise on its actual gameplay, though.

The app is great and the game fun but tired of having to wait a 1/2 hour to play after I've run out of their allotted amount of games for the period. Sure, I can keep playing if I pay. Or I can avoid the frustration and delete the app. If it were consistent, 10 free games then you're in time out, that'd be fine. But it's unpredictable. Also noticing that the developer isn't responding to reviews. must be making enough money that they don't care.

First off, no ads. Win for that at least. My disappointment stems from the lack of the advertised game concept, that being the king character in scenarios that need to be played against a timer to rescue him. This mechanic is seemingly nowhere to be found. It's a match 3 game for sure, with some interesting variations yet still lazily traditional gameplay. Nearly 30 levels in and the "royalty characters" are featured nowhere except on the branding and cutscene animations. Still false.

BEWARE!!! The cool game levels shown in their advertisements do NOT appear in the game. I asked their tech support where the levels were. Their response: "The ads that show the King needing to be rescued show a special game mode that is not available in Royal Kingdom at this time." I told them this was like a restaurant advertising food they don't even serve. "From time to time, different players may see different content within the game." AKA...Bait and switch.

Boring I'm at level "320" right now and I have never paid to play (nor do I intend on paying). But, here is why I will be deleting soon. The game is nothing like the ads. It lets you know somewhere in the game that the King rescue doesn't occur until around the level "1000". Now, the way around paying is tedious. You have to just keep declining to pay or use your 900 coins. Just start that level over from scratch. Eventually, the icons will all come down in the game and you'll beat the level.

As many others have stated, it starts out fun but quickly becomes boring, frustrating, and money grabbing. Honestly, it's a little scammy. I was looking forward to saving the kind from the rock slide. That isn't a puzzle in the game. I played for a while. Spent some discretionary funds I had set aside for entertainment. But that fund is spent for the month so I'll be uninstalling. This could have been a better game. But, alas, greed once again stifles creativity.

I love the graphics and I do like the game but it is WAY TOO HARD. So much harder than Royal Match. I'm not even on level 300 yet & I can't beat half the levels without paying money, and I'm really good at this game. I've never had to put this much money out for this type of game before. Also, they make you pay so much money and you only get 1 power up. at least the other game gave you 3. I've already put in so much money and I can't do it anymore. Uninstalling and going back to something else.

It's a good match-3 game, but I need to reduce the rating due to the deceptive advertising. After more than 150 levels I still haven't seen one that involves the rescue scenarios shown in every single ad. I know that it would be cost-prohibitive to make every level like that, but there should be an occasional level that utilizes the game mode if you're going to use it as the primary means of drawing in players.

Is a money game. At first is easy to clear levels, so you get hooked to it and play. After level 300-500 most are impossible to clear, unless you spend money to buy coins and get more chances. The more you spend, the more it requires you to spend. You spend, it does let you clear levels easy for a while, then again it makes it difficult to clear and get you to spend your coins. So you need to spend more money to continue playing. And this keeps on, money game or you won't be able to clear levels

Worse than royal match if that can be possible. Levels fun until around level 150, then your money starts falling. Payments for each level are meager (20 coins or less)and only pay you at the end for the first explosion of bonuses left behind after completing a level. After that, any more explosions don't count. They created this game because most of the long-time players left Royal Match. Unistalling.

Yet another game that bears zero resemblance to the ads for it. I'm over 500 levels in and not seen anything remotely similar to the "stop the screen filling" gameplay they show in the ads: it's just another "match 3" clone. On the plus side, it is ad free, and you can absolutely play it without spending a penny on microtransactions; just that it's nothing remotely new. It's not bad, it's just... more of the same - and honestly, they really should be fined for false advertising

The game is great, and I appreciate No Ads! The only problem is, when you think you've got the puzzle solved, there's always, and I mean always, one item left to destroy. Which means you either keep trying forever or buy your way out. It's NOT cool. Also. It seems as you acquire higher levels, the bombs,etc. do not work as well destroying what is needed to win! Typical game. Starts out great & ends up a money pit!!

I just got the game to see if it's really that bad what others have in the reviews and I must say, it is. Besides taking up to 15-20 lifes to finish 1 level, it is impossible to finish events. That's why you see pretty much no one with any special avatar stuff or actually anyone playing. Not sure if it's worth to download, have to have a lot of patience to finish levels if you don't want to spend money. Edit: sitting several days on 1 level, can't finish them without using stuff. I am uninstalli

I downloaded just to leave this message: a 3+ minute ad in another game makes me want to play this game even less. I get that ads are meant to get your game in front of a lot of eyes, but when I have to wait 3 or more minutes to get back to my other game, it doesn't excite me about this game, it makes me hate it more. also, the progress bar on the ad doesn't move at a constant rate, which is shady and makes me flag the ad as broken.

so disappointed. I like others thought I was getting the game in the ads. I played despite this, and I have been stuck on level 265 for days now. 36 moves to start, three different 'bosses' to defeat, a barrier that requires multiple hits, and when you kill the final boss, he explodes into 50 pumpkins! There is no way to advance to the final boss with the amount of moves required to defeat him, even using power-ups on the previous ones. I refuse to pay money for extra moves. Delete.

Has a great variety of puzzles and items to help put together the building materials need for each part. The extra games are also fun to play in getting a chance to earn more prizes or materials to build the kingdom. A downside is that some of puzzles the moves go to quick when using the items. In addition the game at times may freeze up, while you're playing.

Royal Kingdom is a literal rehash of Royal Match. They added a battle style level that is different, but Royal Match has more mini games. the problem with this one is what everyone elses one star review says: the fun plateaus into hard abruptly and doesn't really get easier. It stops being fun and losing on a single level 30 times is pretty boring. You'll have fun at first but move on eventually... but the devs don't read these, so it probably won't improve.

title: Microsoft PowerPoint
description:
The presentation and slides app that you can carry with you wherever you go ‚Äì Microsoft PowerPoint. Make a slideshow with music, graphics and charts. Templated PowerPoint slideshows help make your quarterly reports, yearly reports and more shine.

Get the familiar slideshow tool you know and love with the PowerPoint app. Create, edit, and view slideshows and present quickly and easily from anywhere. Present with confidence and refine your delivery, using Presenter Coach.

Present slideshows and access recently used PowerPoint files quickly while on the go. Presentations sync seamlessly across devices, so you won‚Äôt have to worry about multiple file versions when you work on PowerPoint mobile.

Give presentations with training from Presenter Coach, an AI tool designed to help with public speaking. Practice presentations on your own using a presentation timer with Presenter Coach. Presenter Practice presentations with real-time suggestions from Coach to help you adjust your pacing, avoid ‚Äúumms‚Äù and speak confidently.

Make a slideshow with powerful and customizable presentations that make you stand out. Present and create slides from anywhere. Presentations made on PowerPoint help make an impact in the way you present and collaborate. With PowerPoint, you can collaborate and edit your ppt or pptx files in real time and customize it on the go.

Present Slideshows with Confidence
‚Ä¢ Slideshows are easy to edit & present using PowerPoint mobile
‚Ä¢ Present a slideshow free of errors with the help of Presenter Coach
‚Ä¢ This presentation maker gives you the option to create presentations from scratch or work on pre-existing slides
‚Ä¢ Make a slideshow & present your point clearly & confidently using presentation view on any device
‚Ä¢ Practice slideshow presentations for your yearly reports with the Presenter Coach to master public speaking

Make Presentations That Leave a Lasting Impression
‚Ä¢ An expertly crafted presentation is always a winner
‚Ä¢ Presentation timer lets you deliver your slideshows & present information concisely
‚Ä¢ Presentation maker: Take advantage of a slides app with highly customizable tools & present your slideshows with confidence
‚Ä¢ Photo Slideshow: Add any photo or take one right from the app
‚Ä¢ Slideshow video maker: Insert any video or record a new one right from your phone

Collaborate with Others Easily
‚Ä¢ PowerPoint makes it easy for you to collaborate with others
‚Ä¢ Make a slideshow & share with your team to get feedback & edits
‚Ä¢ View presentation permissions and see who‚Äôs working on which slides
‚Ä¢ Slides can have integrated comments  letting you stay on top of changes & feedback

REQUIREMENTS
1 GB RAM or above

Become a skilled presentation maker & take advantage of the slides app with highly customizable tools and present your slideshows with confidence

Unlock the full Microsoft 365 experience with a qualifying Microsoft 365 subscription for your phone, tablet, PC, and Mac.

Microsoft 365 subscriptions purchased from the app will be charged to your Play Store account and will automatically renew within 24 hours prior to the end of the current subscription period, unless auto-renewal is disabled beforehand. You can manage your subscriptions in your Play Store account settings. A subscription cannot be cancelled during the active subscription period.

This app is provided by either Microsoft or a third-party app publisher and is subject to a separate privacy statement and terms and conditions. Data provided through the use of this store and this app may be accessible to Microsoft or the third-party app publisher, as applicable, and transferred to, stored, and processed in the United States or any other country where Microsoft or the app publisher and their affiliates or service providers maintain facilities.

Please refer to Microsoft‚Äôs EULA for Terms of Service for Microsoft 365 on Android. By installing the app, you agree to these terms and conditions: http://aka.ms/eula

summary: Seamlessly integrate data and reports to build your presentation to impress

scraped_reviews.content: Much less features than Windows desktop app, and external keyboard and mouse are required for basic functions. For example, multiple objects cannot be selected unless you use an external mouse. I cannot group multiple selected objects to a single group unless using a keyboard with "ctl+G" shortcut. Still, I could not figure out how to insert a special character, unless I copy & paste from a web-browser. Please add more basic features to this app.

Don't get me wrong, this is good, but it is very basic. It lacks a lot of features, but that's expected bc this is an app for phones. Still, keeps freezing on me, then crashing. File Source: originally local, then had to email it back and forth with my partners for my group project, but still saved a local copy. File Type: pptx Repro the issue: not sure what that means, but switching apps and going back, it crashed. Autosave worked, and once I reopened the app, it worked fine.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Dear User, 
We're sorry to hear about the issues you are facing with the app. Could you please provide us the below information, this will help us resolve the issue faster 
1. File source (email attachment, cloud file, local file or something else)
2. File format (i.e. .ppt or .pptx or something else)
3. Steps to repro the issue

title: LEZHIN FR
description:
Why Lezhin?

Exclusive series: Discover series like Wonderful Stepmother and Lucia exclusively. You won't find our series in French anywhere else!
Scroll through the emotions ‚Äì thanks to vertical scrolling, you can read comfortably and intuitively, wherever you are.

The genres you love ‚Äì and more

Romance ‚Äì from sweet to dramatic, including forbidden love
BL (Boys' Love) ‚Äì our internationally popular series
Fantasy ‚Äì with strong heroines, political intrigue, and magical worlds

Designed for on the go

Whether in bed, on the bus, or on the train, with Lezhin, you always have your favorite stories with you. Our app is optimized for comfortable scrolling and works perfectly, even on the go.

Legal and fair

We support our authors and translators. Every purchase contributes to the creation of new stories.

What you can expect

Free episodes to get you started
Discounts on our series and events on our coin packs
Intuitive library with bookmarks and history

Download it now and dive into the world of Lezhin!

Join our community and discover stories that will thrill you. Whether you're new to digital comics or already a fan, you'll find your next favorite at Lezhin.

title: Manta - Manhwa, Comics, Novels
description:
Welcome to Manta ‚Äì Your Ultimate Webcomics and Webnovels Destination!

Immerse yourself in the captivating universes of Manta, where a diverse collection of stories unfolds across manhwa, webtoons, webcomics, manga, manhua, and webnovels. Whether you‚Äôre captivated by romance, thrilled by action, enchanted by fantasy, chilled by horror, intrigued by BL (yaoi), or swept away by romantasy, our extensive library offers stories that cater to every taste. With Manta, experience immersive storytelling, stunning artwork, and boundless creativity‚Äîright at your fingertips.

With Free Pass, you can read one free episode every 24 hours ‚Äî available on select titles only. No need to pay ‚Äî just wait and enjoy your favorite stories, day by day.

Discover Your Next Favorite Story

- Try our hit series Under the Oak Tree, a fan-favorite loved by millions worldwide.
- Romance fan? We‚Äôre your go-to for epic love tales, featuring exclusives like Tempest Night, Predatory Marriage, Betrayal of Dignity, High Society, The Beast Within, A Wicked Husband, Savor the Taste, Prison Love, and more.
- Searching for BL? We‚Äôre the perfect choice with popular BL titles like Semantic Error, Love Jinx, No Love Zone, The New Recruit, The Dangerous Convenience Store, Punch Drunk Love, Circuit Breaker, and many more!
- Craving more to read other than webtoons? Discover original novels that delve deeper into each world, revealing new layers of the characters and their stories.

Choose from our Unlimited Library and binge exclusive tales, or select individual episodes from a larger library to satisfy your unique story cravings.

For more, please visit:

Website: [http://www.manta.net](http://www.manta.net/)Instagram: http://instagram.com/mantacomicsTwitter: http://twitter.com/mantacomicsPrivacy Policy: https://mantasupport.zendesk.com/hc/en-us/articles/360056564334-Privacy-PolicyTerms of Use: https://mantasupport.zendesk.com/hc/en-us/articles/360056568354-Terms-of-Service

With Free Pass, you can read one free episode every 24 hours ‚Äî available on select titles only. No need to pay ‚Äî just wait and enjoy your favorite stories, day by day.

Discover Your Next Favorite Story

- Try our hit series Under the Oak Tree, a fan-favorite loved by millions worldwide.
- Romance fan? We‚Äôre your go-to for epic love tales, featuring exclusives like Tempest Night, Predatory Marriage, Betrayal of Dignity, High Society, The Beast Within, A Wicked Husband, Savor the Taste, Prison Love, and more.
- Searching for BL? We‚Äôre the perfect choice with popular BL titles like Semantic Error, Love Jinx, No Love Zone, The New Recruit, The Dangerous Convenience Store, Punch Drunk Love, Circuit Breaker, and many more!
- Craving more to read other than webtoons? Discover original novels that delve deeper into each world, revealing new layers of the characters and their stories.

Choose from our Unlimited Library and binge exclusive tales, or select individual episodes from a larger library to satisfy your unique story cravings.

title: Primer | Adaptive Learning
description:
Learn at your own pace from anywhere!

Primer is an educational app that includes lessons to help you learn about hundreds of important topics.

Primer uses an adaptive learning algorithm to quickly identify your current knowledge and recommend new topics to study. After an initial assessment, you will be given lessons on useful topics that build on what you already know.

* Learn from anywhere in almost any language.
* Choose a curriculum for the subject you are most interested in studying.
* Adaptive learning decides when you are ready to move on to a new topic.
* Primer automatically reviews past topics to improve your long-term memory.
* Search from a library that covers hundreds of topics.

Primer is great for students just starting out, as well as adult learners who want to refresh their knowledge on specific topics.

Note: This app is maintained by a small but dedicated international team. Please share your feedback and we will work hard to improve the app in future updates.
descriptionHTML:
Learn at your own pace from anywhere!

Primer is an educational app that includes lessons to help you learn about hundreds of important topics.

Primer uses an adaptive learning algorithm to quickly identify your current knowledge and recommend new topics to study. After an initial assessment, you will be given lessons on useful topics that build on what you already know.

* Learn from anywhere in almost any language.
* Choose a curriculum for the subject you are most interested in studying.
* Adaptive learning decides when you are ready to move on to a new topic.
* Primer automatically reviews past topics to improve your long-term memory.
* Search from a library that covers hundreds of topics.

Primer is great for students just starting out, as well as adult learners who want to refresh their knowledge on specific topics.

Note: This app is maintained by a small but dedicated international team. Please share your feedback and we will work hard to improve the app in future updates.
summary: Self-paced learning for students of all ages.

scraped_reviews.content: I enjoy that the lessons are short, so it's good for a bit of learning during my break time. Some have complained about the specific topics being locked, but I've found it easy to get enough coins (you earn a coin for every short lesson you complete). I only hope that the history one I unlocked stays unlocked for me after my trial of premium üòÖ. I agree that the large font is a bit distracting, but my main problem is that I will encounter questions whose answers are not in the lesson.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for your feedback! We're glad to hear that you find the short lessons helpful and that you've been able to earn tokens easily. Thanks for the suggestion about the font size!

scraped_reviews.content: I personally love the app, When I have something specific I want to look into, it teaches me what I'm curious about, and if I'm not sure what to learn, we'll the general curriculum Bring me something and teaches me things I wasn't sure I knew. The app is great, and the AI is extremely user-friendly, my only downside is it would be nice for there to be an option where we can possibly make the highlight "words" option a contrasting color so it's easier to read, over all I love the app :] üëèü´∂,
scraped_reviews.replyContent: It's wonderful to hear that you're enjoying the app and finding it helpful for your learning needs! Your feedback about the highlight "words" option is noted; we'll consider ways to improve readability in future updates. Thank you for sharing your positive experience with us!

scraped_reviews.content: I don't like it. For one the font in learning is very large with no option to adjust, which increases cognitive load as constant scrolling is needed. Also the "learning" is just a dense summary of the topic, text only, then a bunch of multiple choice questions. Some of the questions are not covered at all in the content, many others have obvious "serious" and "joke" solutions. There's a lack of diagrams or formatting. Just don't think it's a good way to learn things.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We appreciate your feedback! Thank you for pointing out areas for improvement, such as font size options and more in-depth content. We will take your suggestions into consideration to enhance the learning experience.

scraped_reviews.content: In the free version, you are only given access to K-12 educational courses. This material is too basic and multiple choice questions often too simplistic ( one question was "yellow and blue make which color?"). Instead, give us free access to one difficult subject matter of our choosing, such as physics or programming languages, and then to let us decided if the course rmaterial and quizzes are worth paying for premium. Otherwise seems like an app with potential. Thanks.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for your feedback! We value your suggestions. You might consider trying the free trial version to see if it‚Äôs a good fit before deciding to subscribe.

scraped_reviews.content: I've been using primer for over a year. in the beginning, they gave redeem code for the points in exchange, but after the new update, they took the withdrawal option. but by adding the subscription, the withdrawal works fine and point reduction for every question is gone. Quite addictive and trustworthy app to use.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We're glad to hear you've been enjoying the subscription feature and finding the app addictive and trustworthy! Thank you for your support!

scraped_reviews.content: Primer has basically helped me a lot. I literally use it every day in school, on the bus, and I use it almost everywhere. The courses here are easy to understand and well-tailored for students to understand the concept. I recommend this app to every student out there, especially those who are homeschooling. ü§©

title: LINE Camera - Photo editor
description:
A photo editing camera app used by over 200 million people worldwide! „ÄéLINE Camera„Äè

- Over 30,000 stickers and frames
From decorations to face covers, the possibilities are endless.
A wide variety of items is updated weekly.

- Cute, sleek filters
Highly customizable filters let you make your photos look just how you like them.

- Make your own original stickers!
Use your own illustrations, text, or photos to make your own stickers.

- Use the Beauty feature to bring out the natural beauty in your photos!
It‚Äôs easy as pie! Make your photos adorable at the touch of a button!

- Create original collages!
Make collages out of your favorite photos!
- A full collection of photography aids!
Use the Timer, Touch photo, Grid Display, and other photo aids to take a photo in any setting.

- Easy photo sharing
Share your photos on a wide variety of social media, including Facebook, Twitter, and of course LINE.

- Video Recording
Record videos with fun and cute stickers.

- LINE Camera Premium
Enjoy unlimited access to exclusive content, including premium sticker&frame.
Your subscription will automatically renew within 24 hours before the end of the current period and will be charged to your account. You can disable auto-renewal anytime in your store settings.
‚Äª Basic app features are free to use without a premium subscription.

=====================================

LINE Camera uses your network in order to automatically download content including cute and lovely stickers and frames that are absolutely free. Approximately 50MB of data will be downloaded upon initial installation.

Photos are uploaded only when you choose to share them to social media.

It‚Äôs easy as pie! Make your photos adorable at the touch of a button!

- Create original collages!
Make collages out of your favorite photos!
- A full collection of photography aids!
Use the Timer, Touch photo, Grid Display, and other photo aids to take a photo in any setting.

- Easy photo sharing
Share your photos on a wide variety of social media, including Facebook, Twitter, and of course LINE.

- Video Recording
Record videos with fun and cute stickers.

- LINE Camera Premium
Enjoy unlimited access to exclusive content, including premium sticker&frame.
Your subscription will automatically renew within 24 hours before the end of the current period and will be charged to your account. You can disable auto-renewal anytime in your store settings.
‚Äª Basic app features are free to use without a premium subscription.

=====================================

LINE Camera uses your network in order to automatically download content including cute and lovely stickers and frames that are absolutely free. Approximately 50MB of data will be downloaded upon initial installation.

Photos are uploaded only when you choose to share them to social media.
summary: Make your photos fun & attractive‚ô™

scraped_reviews.content: I've been using this app for awhile to edit photos and add stickers/borders. They have really cute stickers. However, as of a few months ago, I cannot access ANY stickers, including the ones I PAID for. Everything just says "Coming Soon". Super frustrating. I emailed them and no response. Prior to this issue, some stickers I've previously paid for wouldn't be available, like what? I paid for it and it even says it'd be available "forever"...

Ahhh no, what is with this network issue now???? I'm trying to look at new stamps and frames to buy (hope you have some cute school related ones) and it keeps giving a network error. Otherwise I love this app. Been using it for years and yes it's had its EXTREMELY ANNOYING glitches, some that are still present. But overall it has the best frames, stickers and some great filters to decorate pictures with etc. The font however after saving it, always looks a bit pixelated. Fix that PLEASE.

I'm so mad and frustrated with the recent changes. You cannot do anything anymore unless you pay for the premium subscription; no saving the photos you edited, no using stickers and frames ALREADY PURCHASED IN THE PAST and no changing the theme, using previously free editing tools. I've used this app for a decade and now deleting it ASAP; money straight down the drain

this was my go to photo app for a decade but the changes they made this year have made it unusable for me. they got rid of my favorite filters, made everything paid, covered the app in ads, and now half the time I open it it doesn't even load the home screen so I can't use it at all! they ruined a perfectly good, functional app with affordable optional items and now I'm desperate to find something else. A real shame.

ruined now. I've loved this app since at least 2014 and now you've implemented ads and pay walls. absolutely destroyed. not to mention tons of random glitching now on features that worked fine before. what you've done is so evil after offering a mostly free product for so many many years.

This app is complete DOG WATER! Can't even crop images like before. Takes numerous times to crop images and freezes. Ads run the entire experience. Have to sit there for at least 30 seconds or close the app. This is a great example of how greed and stupidity ruins a good idea. STAY AWAY FROM THIS APP!

Used to love this app and was more than willing to pay the $1.50 or so for stickers and frames. Now I can't even use the app anymore because of glitches, lag, and ads. Why would I pay for a subscription just to use filters?!

The quality of this app has decreased. Bombarded with ads, constant push to purchase premium plans. LINE Camera used to be really cute and fun to use but it feels more like a chore with so many features now paywalled. It saddens me to see LINE camera has lost the charm it once had.

Why can't we adjust the picture to fit inside a different size anymore? crop feature has been disabled for this, but if I choose Instagram post size, I want to pit the whole image in there. Now I can't adjust it at all. This app just gets worse and worse. I wish I'd never invested in buying all the stickers.

I have used this app for years. I loved using frames, but but now, I can no longer adjust the picture in the frame like I used to. It seems like whomever has taken over with this app wants it to fail. How sad.

This app has been my go to app for editing but now it's almost unusable because of this unremovable glitchy effect that happens randomly when editing the stickers or flipping things around. Hope this gets resolved soon!!

while using line camera app in multi space we are getting this error.Check that Google Play is enabled on your device and that you're using an up-to-date version before opening the app. If the problem persists try reinstalling the app.
its alright as long as you dont accidentally use the paid settings and end up being blocked from saving your photo unless you paid for subscription.

i use it for yearsss but now all my sticker collection are gone, i must pay monthly/yearly subscription to get it back, but i purchased it before,,i've paid for it and it say "VALID FOREVER", but now it can't be restore üíîüíîüíî
I have used this app for almost a decade. It has now been ruined with crummy ads, and to use some filters now you have to pay a premium EACH MONTH???? Yeah. No Thanks.
I used to use it as my go to photo editing app for simple things but now you can't save pictures and taking a screenshot creates a black screen

everytime I open or try to use it it stops me from taking any pictures until I watch 60 seconds worth of advertisements. it is my data and I do not have time in my life Iine of work to wait 60 seconds before I can shoot a picture. when I turn my camera on it's because I need a picture right then a minute later and the shot needed is gone after you watch the forced advertisements it takes one and gives you allot of editing choices

The new version is terrible You can no longer auto crop and adjust the size freely and have to choose pre-set. It is gone much worse. Also with ads and in-app purchases. I am using the app for 9+ years. This update just spoiled everything.

EDIT: They fixed the May update that made the app unusable for me. :)))) I can now make images/stickers/frames transparent, saturated, etc. again without a weird glitch effect or the app crashing!!! Very happy as this was always my go-to photo editor and I'd been using this for years. thank you
became subscription trash. uninstalling and find something just as same, if not better, for free.

Update: as of 28 July 2025 the issues are all fixed thankfully. Thank you to the developers! Please fix the glitch issuesfor the animation stickers!! The placement of the animation stickers are all shifted after they are saved into the phone too. I brought so many stickers from this app cus I love how functional it is and pretty and customisable it is. Its the final photo app I really like. Please don't disappoint me.

For many years this was my favourite, it had lots of great filters and editing tools, all for free, with barely any ads. Then after a while it kept crashing, so I updated it, and now it has long ads interrupting all the time!! It has become so frustrating to use. I shouldn't have updated it, it was easier when it just occasionally crashed...

Some paid content, labeled as 'available forever' was removed from my inventory with no warning. They tell you use 'restore purchases' but it doesnt work and they never answer any email requesting help. I have written many email but there is no customee service. They can take your money but they cannot help you if there is a problem. Buyers beware!

New Version is Not Good, Old Version is Better and Very Good And Use full, Because Old Version make Design. Just like you could have made any design and put any other picture on it, by picking it up from the gallery, In this you can pick up the picture from the gallery only once and not again. Yesterday I again Update and Received old option, Thankyou Sir‚ù§Ô∏è

I love using this editing app, it's 1 of the few that stayed in my phone. BUT I've noticed that some of the stickers from JP artists/brands are gone from the store. Kind of sad about that, I wanted to get them. Also in collage mode, it doesn't allow me to resize the photo/s sometimes. "No zoom in feature" or something. But overall still 1 of my favorite editing apps for photos!

Had use this for several years when it was under line co., it was my go to app to deco pictures, and even had deco stickers that felt worth to buy. But unfortunately after another company took over it became filled with ads and can barely be used, unless a yearly or monthly package is purchased. if i could i would give 0 stars on how bad it's becoming.
thanks for ruining what was a great relatively "free" editing app. Now, everything new is an in app purchase or a subscription. so you can shove ya app.
I've been using this app for a long time but the recent change to how you crop photos is so annoying I like the freedom of movement of how it was before

These past few years, the app has been getting worse and worse with ads. Ive finally hit my breaking point. The ads are very deceiving in terms of how small the exit button is and how it hides until you wait maybe 5 seconds. Getting 3 of these in a row just for 1 picture is ridiculous

It has many filters, frames, stamps, and other tools. It can also edit a picture from gallery, not just a just-taken picture. It is also connected to Line Card and Line Deco. But the tools that it actually offers are not all available on my phone. Are some tools available for certain phones? I wish I could have all those tools and I will give one more star then.
used to be my favorite photo editing app a couple of years ago before it became borderline unusable due to the ad overload
recent update removed dark mode, every update since adding ads has made the app less and less useful, I'm uninstalling.

Like I'm not gonna lie guys, simple is sometimes better. It has everything you need and yes sometimes it bugs out, but you just gotta restart the app and try again. It's free, easy to use and just superior. Ads can occur but also very VERY few. Srsly putting u onto ts bc I've used it to make myself backgrounds, make OCs and other stuff since I was like 7?? #LOVELINECAMERA (ps: they also have rrly cute stickers)

I used to ADORE this app and use it so much and have spent a lot of money on stickers and frames. Recently, I had to switch phones and now can't access any of the ones I want. Almost ALL of my stickers are nowhere to be found, and I can't even find them in the shops. I saw there was a restore issue and gave the steps a shot, but I'll be honest if I can't get the stickers and such that I paid my money for I'm never using this app again. I'll find another photo editing app to use.

I really enjoyed editing my photos with this app. The lines were good for that artsy look. I would sketch around my face and then move it a bit to the side. The app was never glitchy and the adverts fine as there weren't many. Would recommend to people who love to add colour to their images. I would totally act in a advert for this even if just getting paid ¬£10 üòèüòÇ

In it's Hay day it was an amazing app. What I appreciated about it was the all in one editor, you could add a variety of frames, stamps, text, etc easily and you still can do that. However, it's now massively outdated, even the new frames and stamps look so outdated. They refuse to give us new free frames and I wouldn't care, but most of the free frames look so bad. In the past we frequently got new ones. The frames and stamps are too expensive, 1.99$ per each? No thanks.

I think this is the most helpful and useful app to edit and design. I have looked so many times to find an app that would be useful and none of them was the one I liked. Until my friend recommended this.This app gives many options to edit. There are many backrounds to choose from or you can just pick your own! The best part is that if you want to add words to your picture, there are many fonts to choose from! There are in app purchases. There are also NO ads! Hope you found this useful!

I use to love this app. I used it for MANY years and have bought a lot of stuff for it. Lately it has been a constant nuisance. I constantly have to delete it and redownload it for continuous issues. Whether it be stickers not working, borders not working, or fonts not changing colors or border colors. I am going to search for a better app. Tech support has been no help other than to uninstall and reinstall. Then I have to redownload all my purchases again. After so many, I'm tired of doing this

As long as photos can't be saved to SD, this will never get more than 3 stars. (My review from 2015) If I could give negative 5 stars today, I happily would. I am annoyed that now I am being charged for something that was free for over a decade. That's pitiful. It would have made more sense to make a new app, then limit the original. So, thanks to this change, I'll have one less app on my phones & tablets. RIP LINE Camera.

Personally, I love this app! I've tried many other related ones and not one even comes close to the same quality üòçüì∏ photo editing section is amazing, as well the sticker/frame option. There is anything you can imagine basically (In sticker/Frame section) If you have never tried this app, I am üíØ% sure that you are going to love it!! Hope you enjoy LINE Camera! üñ§ Take care üôÉ

I've been using this app for a long time. The frames and stickers you can buy are really awesome and this app makes customizing and decorating your images very easy. My only gripe with this app is that most of the time almost half of my sticker / wallpaper packs aren't available to be used because of some sort of error. I always make sure to keep the app updated but that doesn't seem to be the issue. This has been happening for a while now and it's very upsetting since spending $ for these.

It was great. I've used it since 2016 and loved it. LOVED IT!!! But lately it has become way too intrusive. It downloads add-ons all by itself. And just recently, needs the permission "access to make phone calls," in order to allow me to keep using the filters & stickers I've paid for over the years. It wouldn't even let me use the app anymore if I don't allow this permission. That said, loved the app over the years. But sadly, it's time to say goodbye. I'm gonna miss Brown on my photos.

Too many ads now! Very intrusive! Not only that, there are several stickers I purchased over the years on my account that I can't retrieve anymore. Just disappeared entirely from their platform. I can let that go, but PLEASE GET RID OF THE ADS or at least decrease the quantity!

I love this app. It's great for editing photos. There are some really nice filters and stickers you can use. My only issue with it is that there seems to be a delay between when I save a photo or take a photo and when it appears in the app. if I take a photo or download one I cannot select it from the list of photos on the app unless I go and select share from the photo in my gallery and then select the app in order to upload it and edit.

i really like this app! it's a fast way to slap on a small edit on your photos to make them pop, and the filter choices are plentiful and different. i have made dozens of photos look 30 times better than they originally looked by playing around in the filters. and the collages are also extremely helpful for when i want to make picture comparisons with friends. i have the photoshop editor but i still come back to this sometimes! if this app only updated more often i would rate this a hard 5.

Used to be my favorite app for quick edits and collages, but after the Android 10 upgrade it's useless. Even with proper permissions it won't load the gallery to select photos from. At first it would just be an endless loading screen, so I uninstalled and reinstalled it, and now it tells me I have no photos on my phone instead. Will gladly change this review if it's fixed!

Deleting this after over 10 years of use. shocking to see things are being pay walled. Thought LINE was a very prosperous company but they also fell to greed over locking free features to making people pay for convenience.I even paid for many items in this app but now that it's become a monthly use for things that were previously free, it's been a good run. By the way, whatever happened with the filters, it lags way more now. Good luck LINE if your company is pressed for cash.

So far, I love using this app to take better photos than my built-in camera app. However, taking photos using this app isn't as quick as the built-in. I have to open the app, open the camera menu, and wait for a few seconds after I click the shutter. And when I need to record video, it can only record up to 30 seconds. I hope you can improve this. Thank you.

I love the filters on this app but the stickers don't work at all, and that was my main point of getting this app. Very disappointed with that. The sticker icons show up blank. Frames also don't work. Even when I update the app it doesn't fix it. Please fix these problems! I use another app to decorate my photos now because this one doesn't work properly!

Update: ew it has ads now. Really obnoxious annoying ads. I had to watch 3 just to do a simple thing. Gtfo. It also deleted some sticker sets I had paid for and cannot get back. It wasn't a great app to begin with and now it's worse. There was a time it was owned by someone else and it was great. But now it's a mess. Really sad to see this app be this way.

title: ClassDojo
description:
Ready to build an amazing classroom community?

ClassDojo is a beautiful, safe, and simple communication app for teachers, parents, and students. 

* Teachers can encourage students for any skill, like ‚ÄúWorking hard‚Äù and ‚ÄúTeamwork‚Äù
* Teachers can bring parents into the classroom experience by sharing photos, videos, and announcements
* Students can add their classwork easily to their own digital portfolios for their parents to see
* Teachers can also safely and instantly message with any parent
* Parents see their child‚Äôs updates at home, as well as a stream of photos and videos from school
* All your favorite teacher tools, like Group Maker and Noise Meter, are now in one place!

ClassDojo helps teachers build a positive classroom culture by encouraging students and communicating with parents.

ClassDojo is free for everyone, and K-12 teachers, parents, students, and school leaders in over 180 countries have joined. It works on all devices, like tablets, phones, computers, and smartboards.

See how much people love ClassDojo at: www.classdojo.com/wall-of-love/

Join the ClassDojo community today!
